translation.en: [Finan] For a hundred years, there was chaos in our lands.
translation.zh: 一百年来 我们的土地上纷乱动荡

translation.en: War between Saxons and Dane invaders.
translation.zh: 撒克逊人与丹麦入侵者之战

translation.en: And war between men who wanted to be kings.
translation.zh: 王位争夺之战

translation.en: My lord, Uhtred, son of Uhtred, born a Saxon, but raised a Dane,
translation.zh: 吾主尤特雷德 尤特雷德之子生于撒克逊 但长于丹麦

translation.en: had brought about a fragile peace.
translation.zh: 他带来了一段脆弱的和平

translation.en: But as King Edward's health faltered,
translation.zh: 但随着爱德华国王的健康状况日渐恶化

translation.en: trouble spread.
translation.zh: 骚乱也开始肆溢

translation.en: And while most of the country was sworn to the Saxons,
translation.zh: 虽然全国大部分地区都已宣誓效忠撒克逊人

translation.en: Uhtred's land of Northumbria was not.
translation.zh: 但尤特雷德的诺森布里亚地区依然不肯屈服

translation.en: And enemies were keen to exploit this.
translation.zh: 而敌人敏锐地利用了这一点

translation.en: Wolf!
translation.zh: 狼军！

translation.en: Wolf! [grunts] Wolf!
translation.zh: 狼军！

translation.en: Destroy the settlement. Leave no sign we have landed.
translation.zh: 摧毁村落不要留下我们踏足过的痕迹

translation.en: [warrior] Anlaf, we have the spy.
translation.zh: 安拉夫 我们当中有奸细

translation.en: Behold my child.
translation.zh: 看看我的孩子

translation.en: Behold the daughter of Anlaf.
translation.zh: 看看安拉夫的女儿

translation.en: You look ridiculous.
translation.zh: 你这打扮真滑稽

translation.en: It is how they dress, Father. If I'm to hide amongst them, I must appear--
translation.zh: 他们的着装就是这样 父亲如果我要混进他们之中 我就必须打…

translation.en: Is King Edward dead?
translation.zh: 爱德华国王死了吗？

translation.en: Not yet.
translation.zh: 还没有

translation.en: -But each breath could be his last. -Then we chose our moment.
translation.zh: -但他随时都有可能咽气-那我们伺机而动

translation.en: A king dies, Saxons always turn on each other.
translation.zh: 国王升天 撒克逊人总是会自相残杀

translation.en: Pass this news to all kings who hate them.
translation.zh: 把这个消息散布给所有憎恨他们的国王

translation.en: Tell them I have crossed from Irland and wish to make allies.
translation.zh: 告诉他们 我从爱尔兰跋山涉水而来想与他们结为联盟

translation.en: Return yourself to Winchester.
translation.zh: 你快回温切斯特去

translation.en: Wait.
translation.zh: 等着

translation.en: Play with them.
translation.zh: 和他们周旋

translation.en: Unleash chaos.
translation.zh: 引发混乱

translation.en: [guard] No. Stay back.
translation.zh: 不 退后

translation.en: [soldier] Find the queen!
translation.zh: 把王后找出来！

translation.en: [Aldhelm] Lady Eadgifu,
translation.zh: 埃德吉夫夫人

translation.en: the traitor Aelfweard has sent men to take you and Prince Edmund into protection.
translation.zh: 叛徒埃弗威尔德派了人来保护你和埃德蒙王子了

translation.en: I have no wish to be a hostage.
translation.zh: 我不想当人质

translation.en: -Can we fight them? -Not without Aethelstan.
translation.zh: -我们能打败他们吗？-没有埃特尔斯坦就不行

translation.en: Well, surely, my guards can--
translation.zh: 我的护卫军无疑可以…

translation.en: Loyalties are shifting and factions forming.
translation.zh: 忠诚正在转变 派系正在形成

translation.en: It is not certain who supports us.
translation.zh: 敌我难辨

translation.en: We should flee with your son whilst we can.
translation.zh: 我们应该趁还来得及带您儿子一起逃走

translation.en: [Eadgifu] I will not forgive this.
translation.zh: 我绝不会原谅这种事

translation.en: Nor forgive Aethelstan for leaving us exposed.
translation.zh: 也不会原谅埃特尔斯坦置我们于危险而不顾

translation.en: Damn him for his absence.
translation.zh: 此刻缺席简直罪该万死

translation.en: Come, Edmund. We are leaving.
translation.zh: 快点 埃德蒙 我们要走了

translation.en: -[soldier 1] Where's the queen? -[soldier 2] Move! Look everywhere!
translation.zh: 王后在哪里？ 快走！别放过任何角落！

translation.en: -[Edmund] Mother, what's-- -[Eadgifu] Sh. Quiet.
translation.zh: -母亲 怎么…-嘘 别出声

translation.en: -Wait. -[footsteps approaching]
translation.zh: 等等

translation.en: -[Eadgifu] Pyrlig. -[Pyrlig] We got word.
translation.zh: -皮耶利格-我们收到了消息

translation.en: Aethelstan has gone on pilgrimage to pray for his father's health.
translation.zh: 埃特尔斯坦去为他父亲的健康祈福了

translation.en: Then find him and tell him of his death.
translation.zh: 那就找到他 传达他父亲的死讯然后替我教训他

translation.en: Then strike him, from me, for he swore to protect us.
translation.zh: 那就找到他 传达他父亲的死讯然后替我教训他 因为他曾发誓会保护我们

translation.en: [Aldhelm grunts] Come. There's no time.
translation.zh: 快走 没时间了

translation.en: [Pyrlig] Where will you go?
translation.zh: 你们要去哪里？

translation.en: -To Uhtred. -The pagan?
translation.zh: -去找尤特雷德-那个异教徒？

translation.en: -[soldier] They're in here! -[Aldhelm] Go! Go!
translation.zh: -他们在这里面！-快走！

translation.en: [Eadgifu] Uhtred betrayed my husband.
translation.zh: 尤特雷德背叛了我丈夫

translation.en: Are we sure this is wise?
translation.zh: 这确定是明智之举吗？

translation.en: Uhtred was like a father to Aethelstan. He can be trusted.
translation.zh: 尤特雷德犹如埃特尔斯坦的亲父他值得信任

translation.en: We go to the last kingdom.
translation.zh: 我们去最后一个王国

translation.en: [Finan] He stood in front of the army, and he said, "Release the arrows!"
translation.zh: 他站在大军前方说：“放箭！”

translation.en: And an arrow went right through his head.
translation.zh: 然后一支箭射穿了他的脑袋

translation.en: [Finan] Oh, that was something.
translation.zh: 哦 真是太精彩了

translation.en: But then, the battle for this place certainly sticks in the memory.
translation.zh: 不过后来为争夺此地的那场战役无疑值得纪念

translation.en: -Both times. -[Finan] Hey. Cnut.
translation.zh: -两次都是-嘿 克努特

translation.en: He was a proper… cock!
translation.zh: 他绝对是个…王八蛋！

translation.en: Then there were the horse-killers. Oh, they were deadly.
translation.zh: 还有弑马者 他们非常致命

translation.en: -What was his name? -Bloodhair.
translation.zh: -他叫什么名字？-血缕

translation.en: Bloodhair. And what was her name? She of the curses?
translation.zh: 血缕 那她叫什么？那个诅咒之人？

translation.en: Do not remind me. [belches] Skade! Now, she was moon touched.
translation.zh: -别提醒我 斯卡娣！-她已经疯了

translation.en: Another one who thought she was a seer. It didn't go well for her.
translation.zh: 又一个觉得她自己是先知的人可情况不太顺利

translation.en: I am telling you, my dream was a prophecy. Three nights I have had it.
translation.zh: 我告诉你们 我的梦是一个预言我三个晚上都梦到了

translation.en: -And what is your dream, Ingrith? -[Finan] Don't get her started, Lord.
translation.zh: -你梦到了什么 英格丽德？-别给她脸 领主

translation.en: -Hear my words. "Seven kings must die." -[man] Lord?
translation.zh: 听清楚了：“七王崩”

translation.en: -Seven kings and-- -Ingrith!
translation.zh: -七王…-英格丽德

translation.en: All stand for the queen!
translation.zh: 起立迎接王后！

translation.en: Queen Eadgifu.
translation.zh: 埃德吉夫王后

translation.en: And my most noble friend, Lord Aldhelm.
translation.zh: 还有我最尊贵的朋友 奥德海姆大人

translation.en: What brings you this far north?
translation.zh: 你们为何远赴北方？

translation.en: I come seeking refuge with my son.
translation.zh: 我和我儿子是来寻求庇护的

translation.en: Edward, rightful king of these lands, has died.
translation.zh: 爱德华这片土地的合法国王 已经宾天

translation.en: Then my heart grieves.
translation.zh: 我深感悲痛

translation.en: I'd hoped to reconcile.
translation.zh: 我本欲和解的

translation.en: One down, six to go.
translation.zh: 死了一个 还有六个

translation.en: No! I do not like it.
translation.zh: 不！我不喜欢这样

translation.en: Northumbria recognizes the new king, Aethelstan.
translation.zh: 诺森布里亚拥护新王 埃特尔斯坦

translation.en: Do not assume Aethelstan will be king.
translation.zh: 别预设埃特尔斯坦能够登基

translation.en: -Who is supporting Aelfweard? -[Aldhelm] The ealdormen of Wessex.
translation.zh: -有谁支持埃弗威尔德？-韦塞克斯郡长

translation.en: Of course. Still claiming Aethelstan's a bastard?
translation.zh: 当然 依然称埃特尔斯坦是私生子？

translation.en: Yes. Aelfweard has the wealth of Wiltunscir behind him.
translation.zh: 是的 埃弗威尔德背后有威尔特郡的财富支持

translation.en: Our spies in Aegelesburg say he's there, openly recruiting mercenaries.
translation.zh: 我们在伊盖尔斯堡的密探说他在那边正在公开招募佣兵

translation.en: We will go to Aegelesburg and seize him before he is at full force.
translation.zh: 我们会在他武装齐备之前赶到伊盖尔斯堡抓住他

translation.en: We would prefer your guard.
translation.zh: 我们希望能得到你的护卫

translation.en: My offer gives Aethelstan the time to go to Winchester to be crowned,
translation.zh: 我的提议已经给了埃特尔斯坦时间去温切斯特接受加冕

translation.en: and we avoid a clash of armies.
translation.zh: 而且我们避免了军队冲突

translation.en: I swore an oath to protect Aethelstan--
translation.zh: 我曾宣誓会保护埃特尔斯坦…

translation.en: And of course, you are a man of your word.
translation.zh: 当然 你是信守承诺之人

translation.en: Yet your oath to swear your lands to the king remains unfulfilled.
translation.zh: 但你向国王宣誓效忠的誓言仍未兑现

translation.en: Your husband showed himself hostile to those of Danish blood.
translation.zh: 你的丈夫对有丹麦血统的人表现得充满敌意

translation.en: As such, he was not the right man to unite England.
translation.zh: 因此 他并非统一英格兰的合适人选

translation.en: If he had been, England would be united. [Aldhelm] But now things can be different.
translation.zh: -如果他是 英格兰早就统一了-但如今情况可能有所不同了

translation.en: Aethelstan can be the king to fulfill the Saxon dream.
translation.zh: 埃特尔斯坦有可能成为能够实现撒克逊人梦想的国王

translation.en: If he chooses to swear--
translation.zh: 如果他选择了宣誓…

translation.en: I swore an oath of loyalty, and it stands.
translation.zh: 我曾宣誓忠心不二 此誓言仍然有效

translation.en: If Aelfweard is buying mercenaries, he will be looking for men from all parts.
translation.zh: 如果埃弗威尔德在招募佣兵他将会吸纳各地人员

translation.en: Do you think we can still execute an ambush?
translation.zh: 你们认为我们还能实施埋伏吗？

translation.en: If it is for Aethelstan, then yes.
translation.zh: 如果是为了埃特尔斯坦 那就可以

translation.en: -If he does not fall asleep. -Once. I fell asleep once.
translation.zh: -前提是他别睡着了-一次 我就睡着过一次

translation.en: Are you certain this is better than a band of young fighters?
translation.zh: 你确定这样比一群年轻的战士更合适吗？

translation.en: I hear you do little these days but feast and hunt.
translation.zh: 我听说你最近除了享乐与狩猎 所为甚寡

translation.en: I will not send young men to do a task I swore to do myself.
translation.zh: 我自己誓要完成的任务绝对不会派年轻人们代劳

translation.en: -[horse whinnies] -[Finan] Come on, you little…
translation.zh: 快点 你这个小…

translation.en: Come on! Come on.
translation.zh: 快点！

translation.en: Osbert! What news from our borders? Do the Scots behave themselves?
translation.zh: 奥斯伯特！边境有什么消息吗？苏格兰人是否遵守规矩？

translation.en: Yes, Father. There are rumors Wolf-Warriors landed near Derwent.
translation.zh: 是的 父亲 有传言说狼军已经在德温特附近登陆了

translation.en: -Wolf-Warriors? -Why are you carrying your sword?
translation.zh: -狼军？-你为什么带着剑？

translation.en: We're riding to protect Aethelstan from his brother.
translation.zh: 我们要飞骑前去保护埃特尔斯坦不被他兄弟伤害

translation.en: Then I will come.
translation.zh: 那我也要同去你的所有战斗 我都要一同分担

translation.en: -Any fight of yours is mine. -Stay here and protect your birthright.
translation.zh: 那我也要同去你的所有战斗 我都要一同分担 -留在这里 保护你的天赋权利-坐等前人种树 难有裨益

translation.en: No good comes of sitting waiting for a birthright.
translation.zh: -留在这里 保护你的天赋权利-坐等前人种树 难有裨益

translation.en: So you train the horses and you teach that boy how to defend himself.
translation.zh: 那你就驯驯马匹 教教那孩子自卫

translation.en: No one likes the third son of a dead king.
translation.zh: 没人会喜欢死去国王的第三个儿子

translation.en: Father.
translation.zh: 父亲

translation.en: -Will you swear our lands to Aethelstan? -I must honor my word.
translation.zh: -你会宣誓臣服于埃特尔斯坦吗？-我必须信守承诺

translation.en: Northumbrians will be sad to lose their pagan lord.
translation.zh: 失去他们的异教徒领主诺森布里亚人会伤心的

translation.en: [Finan] Gotcha!
translation.zh: 抓到你了！

translation.en: -Look at this little bastard. -Are we ready?
translation.zh: 看看这个小王八蛋 -准备好了吗？-他在抱怨他的马鞍

translation.en: [Sihtric] He's complaining about his saddle.
translation.zh: -准备好了吗？-他在抱怨他的马鞍

translation.en: -Says his arse gets sore. -[Finan] Didn't say arse. I said my back.
translation.zh: -说他的屁股很痛-我没说屁股 我说后背

translation.en: [Ingrith] I made you this.
translation.zh: 我给你做了这个

translation.en: And one for each of you.
translation.zh: 你们每个人一个

translation.en: Men who sit on cold earth find the cold earth calls for them.
translation.zh: 坐在冰冷土地上的人会受到归于尘土的召唤

translation.en: Once again, she shows herself a seer.
translation.zh: 她再次证明了自己是先知

translation.en: Lord, it was nothing.
translation.zh: 领主 这没什么

translation.en: Tell it again.
translation.zh: 再说一次

translation.en: "Seven kings must die," Lord.
translation.zh: “七王崩” 领主

translation.en: -"Seven kings--" -Ingrith, no.
translation.zh: -“七王…”-英格丽德 别说了

translation.en: Go on.
translation.zh: 继续

translation.en: "And the woman you love."
translation.zh: “以及你心爱的女人”

translation.en: I'm no king, and I have no woman.
translation.zh: 我不是国王 也没有女人

translation.en: -It means nothing. -[Aldhelm] Lord Uhtred.
translation.zh: -没有任何意义-尤特雷德领主

translation.en: I told my son to train yours.
translation.zh: 我让我儿子训练你儿子

translation.en: While you are here, take Wassa as your serving woman.
translation.zh: 你们在这里期间 让瓦萨服侍你们

translation.en: -Make this fortress your home. -I wish to say one thing of Aethelstan.
translation.zh: -把这个堡垒当自己家吧-关于埃特尔斯坦 我想说一点

translation.en: He is not quite the carefree boy you raised.
translation.zh: 他不再是你养大的那个无忧无虑的男孩了

translation.en: He has grown very much into his faith.
translation.zh: 他对自己的信仰有了很深的执念

translation.en: The Brotherhood of Oswald exert great influence.
translation.zh: 奥斯瓦尔德兄弟会影响力巨大

translation.en: I have scared off such men before. For some reason, monks find me terrifying.
translation.zh: 我以前吓跑过这些人不知为什么 修道士们觉得我很可怕

translation.en: -[Uhtred] Let's go play kingmaker. -[Finan] Once again.
translation.zh: 我们再一次去扮演造王者吧

translation.en: [Aethelstan] My father? No, that cannot be.
translation.zh: 我父亲？不 不可能

translation.en: I thought God had given him the winter.
translation.zh: 我以为上帝答应了会让他安然度过这个冬天

translation.en: [Pyrlig] Lord Aethelstan, you should make haste to Wessex for coronation.
translation.zh: 埃特尔斯坦殿下您应该尽快去韦塞克斯接受加冕

translation.en: Your brother gathers men.
translation.zh: 您的兄弟在召集人手了

translation.en: Establish yourself at Winchester before he raises an army.
translation.zh: 在他组军成功之前您要在温切斯特站稳脚跟

translation.en: We will leave when God commands us to leave, Father Pyrlig.
translation.zh: 上帝要求我们离开时我们自会离开 皮耶利格神父

translation.en: And that command has not been given. Return when you have prayed.
translation.zh: 但如斯命令还未下达等你祷告完再回来吧

translation.en: [Aethelstan] Do I depart?
translation.zh: 我要离开吗？

translation.en: [Ingilmundr] Only the book has answers.
translation.zh: 只有书里才有答案

translation.en: Play.
translation.zh: 开始吧

translation.en: You have been guided to the Book of Matthew, verse 157.
translation.zh: 你被指引至了《马太福音》第157节

translation.en: "Then Jesus went thence and departed into the coasts of Tyre and Sidon."
translation.zh: “然后耶稣离开去往了推罗西顿海岸”

translation.en: God wants you to fight.
translation.zh: 上帝希望你奋起一战

translation.en: Oh. Thank you, lady.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 女士

translation.en: [sentry] Halt. State your business here.
translation.zh: 停下 请说明来意

translation.en: We heard a man is looking for fighters.
translation.zh: 我们听说有个人在寻找战士

translation.en: We come to make some coin.
translation.zh: 我们是来挣钱的

translation.en: Go on.
translation.zh: 去吧

translation.en: -This place has fallen to shit. -[Uhtred] Edward left it to decline.
translation.zh: -这地方真够破败的-爱德华任由它自生自灭

translation.en: I'm glad Aethelflaed is not here to see it.
translation.zh: 幸好艾特弗莱德不用看到这些

translation.en: Word has spread. [Sihtric] I swear I've fought half these men.
translation.zh: -消息已经传开了-我发誓 我和这里的半数人交过手

translation.en: [Finan] This is not someone trying to recruit. This is preparing for a battle.
translation.zh: -这可不是什么招募-这是在备战

translation.en: [Uhtred] That is the youth Aelfweard.
translation.zh: 年轻的埃弗威尔德来了

translation.en: Go see what men know of his plans.
translation.zh: 去查查有谁清楚他的计划

translation.en: -Is that amber in your sword? -How much do you want for it?
translation.zh: 你剑里的是琥珀吗？ 多少钱你肯卖？

translation.en: -[Uhtred] Go home to your mothers. -[teen 2] Edgar! No.
translation.zh: 回家找妈妈去吧 埃德加！不要

translation.en: Wilfrid!
translation.zh: 威尔弗里德！

translation.en: Wilfrid!
translation.zh: 威尔弗里德！

translation.en: Do you speak to me, friend?
translation.zh: 你在跟我说话吗 朋友？

translation.en: Your pardon. I thought you were Wilfrid.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我以为你是威尔弗里德

translation.en: A great man I fought with at Tettenhall.
translation.zh: 他是我在特滕霍尔战役的好战友

translation.en: Wait, you were at Tettenhall?
translation.zh: 等等 你参加过特滕霍尔战役？

translation.en: My father was there.
translation.zh: 我父亲也参加了

translation.en: -Who do you fight for now? -Aelf… something?
translation.zh: -你现在为谁而战？-埃弗…什么？

translation.en: -Saxon names are much alike. -The Aelf who marches on Wessex?
translation.zh: -撒克逊人的名字都差不多-要去韦塞克斯的那个埃弗？

translation.en: You haven't heard.
translation.zh: 你还没听说

translation.en: No one's marching on Wessex.
translation.zh: 没人要去韦塞克斯

translation.en: I'm told the new plan is to lure Aethelstan here.
translation.zh: 我听说 新的计划是把埃特尔斯坦引到这里来

translation.en: Aethelstan is on his way.
translation.zh: 埃特尔斯坦已经在路上了

translation.en: Aelfweard challenged him to battle, and he's accepted.
translation.zh: 埃弗威尔德向他邀战 他接受了

translation.en: Why would he agree to that?
translation.zh: 他为什么要答应？

translation.en: Because he's young, and they've baited him.
translation.zh: 他年纪还小 他们哄骗了他

translation.en: They plan to snare him between the gate and men hidden in the hills.
translation.zh: 他们打算把他围困在城门和藏在山里的那些人之间

translation.en: Then we take control before he arrives.
translation.zh: 那我们就在他到达之前取得控制权

translation.en: We can't seize this town with just us, Lord.
translation.zh: 只有我们几个是不可能占领这座城市的 领主

translation.en: We do not need to seize the town.
translation.zh: 我们不需要占领城市

translation.en: [Finan] Hey! Can I tempt you to play for money, friend?
translation.zh: 嘿！我能引诱你来赌两把吗 朋友？

translation.en: [Uhtred] Tie them up and secure the bolt. Stay low until Aethelstan arrives.
translation.zh: 把他们绑起来了 闩上大门藏好 等埃特尔斯坦来

translation.en: [Finan] If there's a bed, it's mine.
translation.zh: 如果有张床 那我要了

translation.en: [Uhtred] He's here.
translation.zh: 他来了

translation.en: [guard in distance] Raise the alarm! Soldiers approach the southern gate!
translation.zh: 拉警报！南门有士兵靠近！

translation.en: [Aelfweard] Come no further! Aegelesburg is loyal to me now.
translation.zh: 别再靠近了！伊盖尔斯堡现在已经臣服于我

translation.en: We do not negotiate with bastards.
translation.zh: 我们不和私生子谈判

translation.en: Nor do we surrender.
translation.zh: 我们也绝不会投降

translation.en: -You'll have to starve us out. -I am not foolish, brother.
translation.zh: -你得把我们饿死-我不是傻瓜 兄弟

translation.en: I assumed you would place a trap.
translation.zh: 我猜你会设下陷阱

translation.en: Perhaps delay me here until your forces could attack at rearguard.
translation.zh: 也许你在此处拖延我等待你的队伍可以从后方袭击

translation.en: Show him what's left of his men!
translation.zh: 让他看看他的手下还剩多少！

translation.en: [Aethelstan] You can yield now, or we destroy the gate and kill all your men.
translation.zh: 你可以现在缴械投降或者让我们毁掉城门 杀光你的手下

translation.en: The gates will hold. No yield will come.
translation.zh: 城门坚不可摧 绝不投降

translation.en: [Aethelstan] Then you will be destroyed.
translation.zh: 那你就和城门同归于尽吧

translation.en: Get ready to open the door.
translation.zh: 准备开门

translation.en: [Aelfweard] I am the rightful king. Your mother was a whore.
translation.zh: 我才是合法的国王 你母亲是个妓女

translation.en: All good men know it. You have no allies.
translation.zh: 世人皆知 你没有盟友

translation.en: Lord Aelfweard.
translation.zh: 埃弗威尔德殿下

translation.en: -I'm Uhtred of Bebbanburg. -Uhtred.
translation.zh: -我是贝班堡的尤特雷德-尤特雷德

translation.en: [Uhtred] You know me as a man who speaks the truth,
translation.zh: 你知道我从不打诳语

translation.en: so hear me when I say, for the common good, stand down.
translation.zh: 所以请听好了为了大家的利益 退下吧

translation.en: My men control the gate. You're outnumbered on all sides.
translation.zh: 我的人已经控制了城门你已腹背受敌 寡难敌众

translation.en: Yield.
translation.zh: 投降吧

translation.en: Let this end with peace.
translation.zh: 让我们和平解决此事

translation.en: [Aethelstan] Give yourself to me, brother.
translation.zh: 宣誓效忠于我 兄弟

translation.en: Then it is over.
translation.zh: 此事就到此为止了

translation.en: Forgive me for my failings, and give comfort to my mother's kin.
translation.zh: 请原谅我的失败请安慰我母亲的家族

translation.en: Tell them of my exile
translation.zh: 转告他们 我被流放了

translation.en: and how we sought to honor our discarded bloodline.
translation.zh: 以及我们有多么以我们被废弃的血统为荣

translation.en: -For Wessex! -[men] For Wessex!
translation.zh: -为了韦塞克斯！-为了韦塞克斯！

translation.en: Lord Uhtred,
translation.zh: 尤特雷德领主

translation.en: open the gate.
translation.zh: 开门吧

translation.en: -No! -[Aethelstan] God chose me rightful heir.
translation.zh: -不！-上帝选择了让我做合法继承人

translation.en: [Uhtred] Aethelstan!
translation.zh: 埃特尔斯坦！

translation.en: Advance!
translation.zh: 前进！

translation.en: Leave no enemy alive!
translation.zh: 将敌人斩草除根！

translation.en: [Finan] Lord, stop this madness!
translation.zh: 领主 快阻止这场混乱！

translation.en: [Uhtred] Stop!
translation.zh: 住手！

translation.en: [Uhtred] Aethelstan!
translation.zh: 埃特尔斯坦！

translation.en: [Sihtric] Get back! Hide!
translation.zh: 退后！躲起来！

translation.en: -[mercenary] I submit! Please don't-- -[grunts]
translation.zh: 我投降了！请不要…

translation.en: Aethelstan!
translation.zh: 埃特尔斯坦！

translation.en: [mercenary] Please, show mercy!
translation.zh: 请发发慈悲吧

translation.en: [Uhtred] No!
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: Stop! They're surrendering!
translation.zh: 住手！他们已经投降了！

translation.en: Aethelstan!
translation.zh: 埃特尔斯坦！

translation.en: -Aethelsta-- -[high-pitched ringing]
translation.zh: 埃特尔斯坦！

translation.en: [man] Lord! Lord, help us!
translation.zh: 领主！领主 救救我们！

translation.en: Aethelstan!
translation.zh: 埃特尔斯坦！

translation.en: Aethelstan!
translation.zh: 埃特尔斯坦！

translation.en: -Stand down your men. -[Aethelstan] Uhtred, why are you here?
translation.zh: -叫你的人退下-尤特雷德 你为什么在这里？

translation.en: [Uhtred] To stop this. Your enemy has surrendered. Halt your men.
translation.zh: 为了阻止这一切你的敌人已经投降了 阻止你的手下

translation.en: -Let him approach and call a halt. -[guard] Yes, my lord.
translation.zh: -让他过来 叫他们住手-是的 殿下

translation.en: -What happened to you? -What happened to you?
translation.zh: -你怎么了？-你怎么了？

translation.en: -You had no need to kill your brother. -I did, or in time, he would return.
translation.zh: -你没必要杀死你的兄弟-有必要 -假以时日 他会卷土重来-你违背了你的承诺

translation.en: -You dishonored your word. -I did not.
translation.zh: -假以时日 他会卷土重来-你违背了你的承诺

translation.en: I told him to yield. I did not say he would survive.
translation.zh: 我让他投降 可没说会放他一条生路

translation.en: It was never our plan to let him live. Lord, reverse the order.
translation.zh: 我们从没想过留他一命殿下 请收回成命

translation.en: We are close to routing them.
translation.zh: 我们就快将他们剿灭了

translation.en: -Hired men have no quarrel with you. -You were right not to seek his help.
translation.zh: -雇一个不会跟你争执的人-你不找他帮忙是对的

translation.en: You kill 100 fathers, you give 300 sons a reason to defy you.
translation.zh: 你杀死一百个父亲你就让三百个儿子有了理由来对抗你

translation.en: Think!
translation.zh: 好好想想！

translation.en: Now's the time to unify.
translation.zh: 是时候统一了

translation.en: Uhtred may be right in this matter.
translation.zh: 这件事上 尤特雷德也许说得对

translation.en: I speak only as a man who has made mistakes before.
translation.zh: 我只是以过来人的身份给点建议

translation.en: -I'm Uhtred of-- -I know who you are.
translation.zh: -我是尤特雷德…-我知道你是谁

translation.en: [Aethelstan] Uhtred, this is Lord Ingilmundr.
translation.zh: 尤特雷德 这位是英吉尔蒙德大人

translation.en: A great commander and a great friend to me.
translation.zh: 一位伟大的将领 也是我的挚友

translation.en: Then a friend to me.
translation.zh: 那也是我的朋友

translation.en: Why the Danish name?
translation.zh: 为什么是丹麦名字？

translation.en: Born to a Dane, but raised a Saxon.
translation.zh: 生于丹麦 但长在撒克逊

translation.en: I found Christ through the works of Alfred,
translation.zh: 我成为了基督徒多亏阿尔佛雷德的努力

translation.en: and indeed through the writings of your son in Rome.
translation.zh: 以及你在罗马的儿子的作品影响

translation.en: You must be proud of him.
translation.zh: 你一定非常以他为荣

translation.en: He is a true scholar.
translation.zh: 他是有大学问的人

translation.en: I'm just the fool who made him.
translation.zh: 我只是生了他的那个傻瓜

translation.en: Ingilmundr holds the garrison at Thelwael on the Wirral.
translation.zh: 英吉尔蒙德负责在威勒尔的特威尔驻守

translation.en: He knows many of the people we knew from Rumcofa.
translation.zh: 他认识很多我们在朗科法的旧相识

translation.en: Good people. I should like to see them again.
translation.zh: 很好的人 我很想再见见他们

translation.en: [Ingilmundr] Yes. Perhaps after you've sworn Northumbria to the new king.
translation.zh: 好啊 也许等你带领诺森布里亚宣誓效忠新王之后吧

translation.en: Honor your word.
translation.zh: 信守诺言

translation.en: Swear to Aethelstan what you denied his father.
translation.zh: 宣誓把你曾拒绝给予埃特尔斯坦父亲的忠诚给他

translation.en: Cede your lands and make England whole.
translation.zh: 割让你的领土 让英格兰完成统一

translation.en: As you say, it is the time for unity.
translation.zh: 如你所说 是时候统一了

translation.en: I will swear to a king, and you are not yet crowned.
translation.zh: 我会向国王宣誓 但你尚未加冕

translation.en: Nor will I kneel to you covered in blood.
translation.zh: 我也不会满身血污地向你下跪

translation.en: I will renounce my lands in the Great Hall at Winchester.
translation.zh: 我会在温切斯特的大殿上放弃我的领土

translation.en: -It doesn't need to be done with ceremony. -But Uhtred is a man of his word.
translation.zh: -仪式并无必要-但尤特雷德是一个言而有信之人

translation.en: Come to Winchester.
translation.zh: 来温切斯特吧

translation.en: Heal the wound.
translation.zh: 赎罪

translation.en: [Ingilmundr] How did he know we were coming here? [Aethelstan] He's always found a way to protect me.
translation.zh: -他是怎么知道我们会来这里的？-他总能找到办法保护我

translation.en: Perhaps he has friends who keep one eye on you.
translation.zh: 他也许找了朋友盯着你

translation.en: [chuckles] My mother was the same.
translation.zh: 我母亲也是这样

translation.en: It's touching, how you still defer to him.
translation.zh: 很感人 你依然对他言听计从

translation.en: -He's been steadfast a long time. -And noble that you trust him.
translation.zh: -他一直都很忠诚-你对他的信任也很高尚

translation.en: Given all that went on with your father.
translation.zh: 鉴于你父亲遭遇的一切

translation.en: [Constantin] Which boy prevailed?
translation.zh: 哪个男孩获胜了？

translation.en: [Domnal] Aethelstan.
translation.zh: 埃特尔斯坦

translation.en: Killed his brother in cold blood and will now claim the Saxon crown.
translation.zh: 冷血地杀了他的兄弟现在将会继承撒克逊的王位

translation.en: [Constantin] Then it's settled. Any word on renewal of the treaty?
translation.zh: 那这事就解决了 续约有消息吗？

translation.en: Push Winchester.
translation.zh: 给温切斯特一点压力

translation.en: -Make contact. -Lord, we've had word of something else.
translation.zh: -联系一下-领主 我们收到一些别的消息

translation.en: -The Dane, Anlaf, seeks a meeting. -The one who eats the flesh of men?
translation.zh: -丹麦人 安拉夫 想要见面-吃人肉的那个？

translation.en: An assembly with you, and the kings of Man, Shetland, and Orkney.
translation.zh: 要与您、马恩岛、设得兰群岛以及奥克尼群岛的国王碰碰面

translation.en: I will not be the lone Christian lured to meet Dane kings.
translation.zh: 我不会成为唯一一个被引诱去见丹麦国王的基督徒

translation.en: They might offer something of interest.
translation.zh: 他们可能会提供一些有益的条件

translation.en: Seek to renew a peace with Saxons.
translation.zh: 力求与撒克逊人恢复和平

translation.en: Edward kept the truce. We have no reason to think his son will not.
translation.zh: 爱德华遵守了停战协议我们没理由认为他儿子会毁约

translation.en: [Domnal] I'll send word.
translation.zh: 我去传令

translation.en: [Anlaf] His own flesh, put to the knife.
translation.zh: 他的亲属 毙于刃下

translation.en: -He is more brutal than you suggested. -His heart has hardened.
translation.zh: -他比你说的还要残忍-他的心肠变硬了

translation.en: Which should harden those against him.
translation.zh: 这会让他的敌人更加强硬

translation.en: -Do other kings in Britain hear our call? -They pretend to be deaf to us.
translation.zh: -英国的其他国王听到号召了吗？-他们对我们装聋作哑

translation.en: -But I know they listen. -They should.
translation.zh: -但我知道他们都在听-应该如此

translation.en: Aethelstan will become greedy.
translation.zh: 埃特尔斯坦会变得贪婪

translation.en: You would know ambition, Father.
translation.zh: 你对野心抱负很了解 父亲

translation.en: Eh, and when my lands are yours, you will know it too.
translation.zh: 等你继承了我的领土 你也会了解的

translation.en: Return to Winchester.
translation.zh: 回温切斯特去

translation.en: Watch everyone.
translation.zh: 监视所有人

translation.en: And bring me word when there's word to tell.
translation.zh: 有消息就告诉我

translation.en: -[Uhtred grunts] -[Osbert] Father, have you been injured?
translation.zh: -父亲 你受伤了？-没有好不了的伤

translation.en: -Nothing that will not heal. -[Eadgifu] Tell me the news is wrong.
translation.zh: -父亲 你受伤了？-没有好不了的伤 告诉我那些消息是假的埃特尔斯坦对他的亲兄弟操戈？

translation.en: -Did Aethelstan turn on his own blood? -[Uhtred] Yes.
translation.zh: 告诉我那些消息是假的埃特尔斯坦对他的亲兄弟操戈？ 是的 埃弗威尔德没能幸存

translation.en: -Aelfweard did not survive. -Then Edmund cannot return to Winchester.
translation.zh: 是的 埃弗威尔德没能幸存 那埃德蒙绝不能回温切斯特

translation.en: He will always be seen as a rival.
translation.zh: 他永远都会被视为对手

translation.en: Aethelstan has always shown great affection for your son.
translation.zh: 埃特尔斯坦对您的儿子感情深厚

translation.en: [Uhtred] But she is right.
translation.zh: 但她说得对

translation.en: He has fallen under an influence.
translation.zh: 他受到了外界影响

translation.en: I shall not leave Bebbanburg until the threat passes.
translation.zh: 那么在威胁解除之前我不该离开贝班堡

translation.en: -You're welcome here as long as you wish. -[Aldhelm] And it will pass.
translation.zh: -你在这里想待多久都行-威胁会解除的

translation.en: The duties of kingship will focus Aethelstan's mind.
translation.zh: 国王的职责会让埃特尔斯坦无暇他顾

translation.en: But I should return south.
translation.zh: 但我该回南方去了

translation.en: I will assess the mood.
translation.zh: 我会评估一下他的心绪

translation.en: [Pyrlig] Almighty and everlasting God,
translation.zh: 全能永存的上帝

translation.en: pour out the spirit of thy grace and blessing upon this, thy servant,
translation.zh: 请将您的恩典与祝福赐予您的仆人

translation.en: King Aethelstan.
translation.zh: 埃特尔斯坦国王

translation.en: That, as by the imposition of our hands, he is this day crowned king.
translation.zh: 在我们的强烈要求下他今日将被加冕为王

translation.en: So he may, by thy sanctification,
translation.zh: 从而让他得以借您的圣化

translation.en: continue always thy chosen servant, through Christ, our Lord.
translation.zh: 通过耶稣 我们的主继续成为您的仆人

translation.en: Grant him the faith of Abraham,
translation.zh: 请赐予他亚伯拉罕的信心

translation.en: the wisdom of Solomon, the courage of David.
translation.zh: 所罗门的智慧 大卫的勇气

translation.en: Vivat Rex! Vivat Rex!
translation.zh: （贰：韦塞克斯、麦西亚与东安格利亚国王）

translation.en: [Aethelstan] You were not there. This moment was all we had talked of.
translation.zh: 你没出席这是我们一直在谈论的时刻

translation.en: -And you were not there. -No.
translation.zh: -但你却没有出席-对

translation.en: I was here.
translation.zh: 我在这里

translation.en: The call of the scripture always comes first.
translation.zh: 圣经的召唤永远是第一位的

translation.en: You believe that, don't you?
translation.zh: 你相信这个的 对吧？

translation.en: Yes, yes, of course.
translation.zh: 当然

translation.en: Then you will be a great king of England.
translation.zh: 那你一定会成为英格兰的伟大国王

translation.en: And all will speak of you as they did Alfred.
translation.zh: 大家都会像谈论阿尔佛雷德那样谈论你

translation.en: Does Uhtred stand by his word?
translation.zh: 尤特雷德有没有信守承诺？

translation.en: No. Uhtred has not come.
translation.zh: 没有 尤特雷德没来

translation.en: -Clearly, he-- -He wishes to remain king in his own land.
translation.zh: -显然 他认为…-他想继续在他的领地称王称霸

translation.en: May God protect him from his vanity.
translation.zh: 愿上帝保佑他远离虚荣

translation.en: But towards you, it is a cruelty.
translation.zh: 但对你来说 这是种残忍

translation.en: And I am sorry. Here. Come. Come.
translation.zh: 我很遗憾 来 过来

translation.en: What torture to enact on so kind a soul.
translation.zh: 这对一个善良的灵魂来说是多么折磨啊

translation.en: -I thought you had both abandoned me. -Of course I would not.
translation.zh: -我以为你们都抛弃我了-我当然不会

translation.en: I'm just surprised Uhtred could be so foolish.
translation.zh: 我只是很诧异 尤特雷德竟然这么蠢

translation.en: You would've thought his years would make him wiser.
translation.zh: 本以为岁月会让他更聪明些

translation.en: Perhaps he still sees the boy you once were,
translation.zh: 也许在他眼里 你仍是当年的孩童

translation.en: and not the man you have become.
translation.zh: 而不是今日的男子汉

translation.en: [Finan] Lord.
translation.zh: 领主

translation.en: It's not Serpent's Breath, but…
translation.zh: 这不是蛇吟剑 不过…

translation.en: it's lighter, it's sharper, and it's got a garnet.
translation.zh: 它更轻 更锋利 而且 上面还有颗石榴石

translation.en: Give it a name.
translation.zh: 给它起个名字

translation.en: Manslayer.
translation.zh: 杀人魔

translation.en: Ball-taker.
translation.zh: 割蛋王

translation.en: Uhtred, Sword of Uhtred.
translation.zh: 尤特雷德 尤特雷德之剑

translation.en: You actually smiled, Lord.
translation.zh: 你刚刚笑了 领主

translation.en: Perhaps losing my sword was a sign that my battle days are over.
translation.zh: 弄丢我的剑也许预示着我征战的日子结束了

translation.en: A bad time to provoke the king.
translation.zh: 现在不是挑衅国王的时候

translation.en: [Uhtred] I did not provoke him.
translation.zh: 我没有挑衅他

translation.en: I'm simply giving him time to prove he's not a tyrant.
translation.zh: 我只是在给他时间证明他不是暴君

translation.en: -Otherwise… -Otherwise what?
translation.zh: -否则…-否则如何？

translation.en: "Seven kings must die." For what?
translation.zh: “七王崩” 为什么？

translation.en: -What did your wife see? -She sees nothing.
translation.zh: -你老婆看到了什么？-她什么都没看到

translation.en: I swear.
translation.zh: 我发誓

translation.en: [Eadgifu] What do they celebrate?
translation.zh: 他们在庆祝什么？

translation.en: [Uhtred] The breaking of the horses.
translation.zh: 驯马

translation.en: [Eadgifu] Thank Osbert for the care he has shown Edmund.
translation.zh: 谢谢奥斯伯特对埃德蒙的关心

translation.en: [Uhtred] He's part of Bebbanburg now.
translation.zh: 他现在也是贝班堡的一员了

translation.en: You both are.
translation.zh: 你们都是

translation.en: [Eadgifu] Yes, my son is quite changed.
translation.zh: 是啊 我儿子转变很大

translation.en: There was a somberness at the palace that has lifted.
translation.zh: 王宫里的阴郁气氛已经消散

translation.en: It's the air here.
translation.zh: 是这里的空气

translation.en: Brings out good spirits in everyone.
translation.zh: 让每个人都能神彩飞扬

translation.en: [Uhtred] You yourself seem happier.
translation.zh: 你自己似乎也开心了

translation.en: I am, Lord Uhtred.
translation.zh: 是的 尤特雷德领主

translation.en: Some grief has passed, and I feel…
translation.zh: 悲痛已经缓解 我觉得…

translation.en: more ready for the world.
translation.zh: 自己能更好地面对这个世界了

translation.en: [Osbert] Control! Good!
translation.zh: 控制！很好！

translation.en: Forgive us these sins that we commit.
translation.zh: 主啊 请怜悯我们的灵魂原谅我们刚刚犯下的罪孽

translation.en: Will we be forgiven?
translation.zh: 我们能得到宽恕吗？

translation.en: Our sin weighs heavy.
translation.zh: 我们罪逆深重

translation.en: Yes, it does.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: But remember,
translation.zh: 不过别忘了

translation.en: God holds us in the balance.
translation.zh: 上帝会整体权衡我们

translation.en: Every sin can be weighed against an act of faith.
translation.zh: 每一项罪孽都可以用信仰实践来平衡

translation.en: Grow the faith and the sin is diminished.
translation.zh: 增强信仰 罪孽自会减弱

translation.en: What if the shadow of sin obscures the faith?
translation.zh: 如果罪孽的阴影遮蔽了信仰呢？

translation.en: Come.
translation.zh: 跟我来

translation.en: Perhaps return to your grandfather's vision for England.
translation.zh: 也许能回归到你爷爷对英格兰的愿景上

translation.en: Perhaps now there is an urgency to bring the pagans to light.
translation.zh: 也许现在急需揭露那些异教徒

translation.en: Will that cleanse me? Us?
translation.zh: 那样能…免除我的罪孽吗？我们的？

translation.en: Well, surely the greater the lands, the greater the faith.
translation.zh: 可以肯定的是国土越强盛 信仰越坚固

translation.en: Go beyond what Alfred dreamed of.
translation.zh: 去超越阿尔佛雷德的梦想吧

translation.en: Look to the islands God made, not the countries ordained by men,
translation.zh: 着眼于上帝创造的岛屿而不是人类设立的国家

translation.en: and bring all to Christianity.
translation.zh: 让他们全部皈依基督教

translation.en: So when you are judged,
translation.zh: 这样等你接受审判时

translation.en: you will be found in balance.
translation.zh: 你的功罪就能平衡了

translation.en: And thus may accept both the sin…
translation.zh: 这样就可以接同时受犯罪…

translation.en: and the conquest against it.
translation.zh: 与征服罪孽的过程了

translation.en: [Finan] Lord!
translation.zh: 领主！

translation.en: Stop.
translation.zh: 别说了

translation.en: [Eadgifu] What do you talk of?
translation.zh: 你们在聊什么呢？

translation.en: Oh my faith, Lady. I cannot lie.
translation.zh: 上帝在上 夫人 我不能说谎

translation.en: The ladies here care for Lord Uhtred and wish keenly he would find a woman.
translation.zh: 这里的女人都很关心尤特雷德领主并真切希望他能找到一个女人

translation.en: Well, they shall be sore of heart. The widow of a king will not marry a lord.
translation.zh: 她们要失望了国王的遗孀是不会嫁给一位领主的

translation.en: I shall have to be more careful in how I conduct myself.
translation.zh: 我应该对自己的行为更谨慎些的

translation.en: It is not the gossips you should fear, Lady.
translation.zh: 夫人 您该担心的不是这些流言蜚语

translation.en: This peace may not sustain.
translation.zh: 这种安宁也许难以为继

translation.en: Lord Uhtred has snubbed the king.
translation.zh: 尤特雷德领主冒犯了国王

translation.en: The women Uhtred has affection for become a target for his enemies.
translation.zh: 尤特雷德心爱的女人成为了他的敌人的目标

translation.en: -[Uhtred] Sihtric! -Sh-sh.
translation.zh: 希特里克！

translation.en: [Uhtred] What have you learnt?
translation.zh: 有什么消息？

translation.en: Aethelstan has claimed Eoferwic.
translation.zh: 埃特尔斯坦吞并了埃弗维克

translation.en: He says since Rognvaldr is dead, there is no king, so it belongs to him.
translation.zh: 他说既然罗格瓦尔德已死那就没有国王了 所以它属于他

translation.en: Eoferwic?
translation.zh: 埃弗维克？

translation.en: They see me as their lord now. Aethelstan knows this.
translation.zh: 他们现在已视我为领主这事埃特尔斯坦是知道的

translation.en: He is demanding all come with tribute.
translation.zh: 他要求所有人都进贡

translation.en: Not just Saxon chiefs, but all kings of Britain.
translation.zh: 不光是撒克逊的首领而是所有的英国国王

translation.en: All the mainland and all the outlying islands.
translation.zh: 整个大陆以及远海岛屿

translation.en: Lord?
translation.zh: 领主？

translation.en: Declare yourself king here. Like your forebears.
translation.zh: 在这里称王吧 像你的先辈那样

translation.en: No. This is Aethelstan.
translation.zh: 不行 这可是埃特尔斯坦

translation.en: If he chooses the wrong path, I must tell him.
translation.zh: 如果他选错了路 那我必须告诉他

translation.en: [Sihtric] Lord.
translation.zh: 领主

translation.en: "There went out a decree that all the world should be taxed."
translation.zh: “颁布了一项法令 要向所有人征税”

translation.en: You owe no tribute! Return to your villages.
translation.zh: 你们没欠什么贡金！回村去吧

translation.en: -Uhtred! Calm yourself. -Pyrlig? What is this tribute?
translation.zh: -尤特雷德！冷静点-皮耶利格？这些是什么贡金？

translation.en: He says it is to build churches, but, please, there are spies everywhere.
translation.zh: 他说是为了建造教堂但是求您了 这里到处都有密探

translation.en: Tell your arseling apprentice he's badly misjudged the mood of Scotland.
translation.zh: 告诉你那个白痴徒弟他严重误判了苏格兰的形势

translation.en: You seem upset.
translation.zh: 你看起来很生气

translation.en: We came to renew our treaty.
translation.zh: 我们是来续约的

translation.en: Instead, we've been left waiting for days, only to be told we are supplicants.
translation.zh: 但我们等了很多天却被告知我们是祈求者

translation.en: I would be careful.
translation.zh: 我会小心的

translation.en: We've had other offers of alliance.
translation.zh: 我们还收到了其他的联盟提议

translation.en: -Why is Aethelstan doing this? -He says to unite Christians.
translation.zh: 埃特尔斯坦为什么要这样做？ 他说是为了团结基督徒

translation.en: And in his prayers, he talks much of atonement.
translation.zh: 在他的祷告中 他常常谈及赎罪

translation.en: Atonement? For what?
translation.zh: 赎罪？什么罪？

translation.en: The death of his brother, the bastardy of his parentage?
translation.zh: 他兄弟的死 他作为私生子的出身？

translation.en: I do not know.
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: Lord Aldhelm and I try daily to dissuade,
translation.zh: 奥德海姆大人和我每天都试图劝阻他

translation.en: but there is talk of conquest and forced baptism.
translation.zh: 但有些关于占领和强迫受洗的传言

translation.en: -Where is he? -The Devil's Stones.
translation.zh: -他在哪里？-魔鬼之石

translation.en: He thinks he fights the devil.
translation.zh: 他以为自己是在和魔鬼战斗

translation.en: [Uhtred] This is madness. Aldhelm.
translation.zh: 这太疯狂了 奥德海姆

translation.en: These stones have stood for generations.
translation.zh: 这些石头世世代代都矗立于此

translation.en: They are an insult to God, apparently.
translation.zh: 他们这样显然是在亵渎上帝

translation.en: Is that Owain, King of Strathclyde?
translation.zh: 那个是欧文吗斯特拉思克莱德国王？

translation.en: [Aldhelm] Aethelstan wanted him to witness it. They were built by his forebears.
translation.zh: 埃特尔斯坦要他亲眼看着它们是他的先祖建造的

translation.en: He is seeking to humiliate powerful men?
translation.zh: 他想羞辱权贵之士吗？

translation.en: [Uhtred] King Hywel.
translation.zh: 海威尔国王 （肆：威拉斯国王）

translation.en: He dares ask submission from Wealas?
translation.zh: 他竟敢让威拉斯投降？

translation.en: After all you did for Mercia?
translation.zh: 在你为麦西亚做了那么多之后？

translation.en: What choice do I have, Uhtred?
translation.zh: 我还有什么选择呢 尤特雷德？

translation.en: He took my son to Winchester.
translation.zh: 他把我儿子带去了温切斯特

translation.en: -He is keeping your son hostage? -You take the son, you take a future king.
translation.zh: 他拿你儿子当人质？ 带走了儿子 就是带走了未来的国王

translation.en: -Now I am forced to follow his bidding. -I will tell him this cannot stand.
translation.zh: -如今我被迫听命于他-我会告诉他这是不能容忍的

translation.en: King Hywel, I swear, Wealas's faithfulness will not be spat on.
translation.zh: 海威尔国王 我发誓威拉斯的忠诚不会被践踏

translation.en: Our poets spoke this.
translation.zh: 我们的诗人这样说过

translation.en: That a Saxon would break us all to build their country.
translation.zh: 撒克逊人会毁灭我们以建立他们的国度

translation.en: This is not just a Saxon country.
translation.zh: 这不只是撒克逊人的国家

translation.en: Aldhelm, get me close to him. I will stop this.
translation.zh: 奥德海姆带我去见他 我会阻止这一切

translation.en: [guard] Halt. Stay back.
translation.zh: 站住 退后

translation.en: [Aldhelm] Step aside! The king requested Uhtred speak with him.
translation.zh: 让开！国王要求尤特雷德上前说话

translation.en: King Aethelstan!
translation.zh: 埃特尔斯坦国王！

translation.en: [Uhtred] Lord King,
translation.zh: 国王陛下

translation.en: let me speak with you alone.
translation.zh: 让我单独和你谈谈

translation.en: [Uhtred] You should not have stepped on my land.
translation.zh: -你不该踏足我的领土-你不该言而无信

translation.en: You should not have broken your word, humiliated me,
translation.zh: -你不该踏足我的领土-你不该言而无信 像羞辱我父亲那样羞辱我

translation.en: as you humiliated my father.
translation.zh: 像羞辱我父亲那样羞辱我

translation.en: I'm trying to make you see you're on the wrong path.
translation.zh: 我是想让你明白 你已误入歧途

translation.en: -You do the bidding of Ingilmundr-- -I do the bidding of the Lord.
translation.zh: -你听命于英吉尔蒙德…-我听命于上帝

translation.en: Do you really seek to convert Danes?
translation.zh: 你真的想让丹麦人皈依吗？

translation.en: -Did I teach you nothing of respect? -Many Danes welcome the Lord.
translation.zh: -我是没教过你尊重吗？-很多丹麦人都很欢迎上帝

translation.en: -Those in my court thank me for it. -Many do not wish it, and you know this.
translation.zh: -我宫里就有人在感谢我-很多人都不愿意 你明明知道

translation.en: Aethelstan, you've always known it.
translation.zh: 埃特尔斯坦 你一直都知道这一点

translation.en: -Even Alfred respected this. -I have more to atone for than Alfred.
translation.zh: -就连阿尔佛雷德都尊重这一点-我要赎的罪比阿尔佛雷德更多

translation.en: Who tells you this? Ingilmundr?
translation.zh: 谁告诉你的？英吉尔蒙德？

translation.en: Does he tell you you are damned without his guidance?
translation.zh: 他是不是跟你说没有他的指引 你将一败涂地？

translation.en: For I've seen before men under the spell of those who claim to know the gods.
translation.zh: 因为我曾见过有人被那些自称了解众神的人所蛊惑

translation.en: He has been a great friend to me.
translation.zh: 他一直都是我的挚友

translation.en: Aethelstan, hump who you wish,
translation.zh: 埃特尔斯坦 你和谁上床都行

translation.en: but do not fall under the influence of those who seek power--
translation.zh: 但不要受那些觊觎权力的人影响…

translation.en: Who makes such vicious claim against me?
translation.zh: 是谁对我提出如此恶毒的指控？

translation.en: -No one. -Who tells such lies?
translation.zh: -没有人-谁造了这样的谣？

translation.en: -It has not been talked of. -Lord Aldhelm, does he spy for…
translation.zh: -从没有人议论过-奥德海姆大人 他是不是密探…

translation.en: What has been said, by who, and for how long?
translation.zh: 传言是什么？谁说的？多久了？

translation.en: No one has said anything. I care not for that, but for you.
translation.zh: 没人说过任何东西我不关心那件事 只关心你

translation.en: Aethelstan, you are a kind man, but you are tenderhearted,
translation.zh: 埃特尔斯坦你是善良的人 但你的心太软了

translation.en: and Ingilmundr is seeking power for himself and for his brotherhood.
translation.zh: 英吉尔蒙德想为他自己以及他的兄弟谋权

translation.en: Lies. Lies and ignominy.
translation.zh: 谎言与耻辱

translation.en: There's no ignominy. He just turns you from your kin.
translation.zh: 没什么耻辱 他就是让你众叛亲离了

translation.en: And you are turned from your king! You seek to be one yourself.
translation.zh: 而你背叛了你的国王！你就是在谋权的人

translation.en: Lord, they consecrate the ground
translation.zh: 殿下 他们已将这片土地圣化

translation.en: and would request you to give the blessing.
translation.zh: 请求您前去赐福

translation.en: Yes, of course.
translation.zh: 好的 没问题

translation.en: Let us leave the King of Northumbria to think on his errors.
translation.zh: 我们让诺森布里亚国王好好反省一下他的错误吧

translation.en: I have no dream to be a king.
translation.zh: 我无意称王

translation.en: Only to protect you.
translation.zh: 只是想保护你

translation.en: Like you ran to protect him in Aegelesburg and ended up being beaten by boys?
translation.zh: 就像你跑去伊盖尔斯堡保护他最后却被一群小子痛打那样？

translation.en: Should he really take counsel from a man who loses his sword to a child?
translation.zh: 他真的应该听取一个被小孩子夺去剑的人的建议吗？

translation.en: Northumbria needs a lord with lust for battle.
translation.zh: 诺森布里亚需要一个有战斗欲望的领主

translation.en: There are rumors Anlaf has arrived and will come Viking.
translation.zh: 有传言说安拉夫已经到达他会发动突袭 烧杀抢掠

translation.en: Do not think he will spare you just because you follow the same gods.
translation.zh: 别以为他会饶你性命只因为你们追随着同样的神明

translation.en: Keep him here a night and make him swear at dawn.
translation.zh: 关他一夜 天明时让他宣誓效忠

translation.en: In time, you will come begging for his help.
translation.zh: 总有一天 你会来祈求他的帮助

translation.en: As all fathers fall,
translation.zh: 因为所有的父亲都会衰落

translation.en: and all sons take their place.
translation.zh: 所有的儿子都会取而代之

translation.en: Lord Ingilmundr has declared you an enemy of God
translation.zh: 英吉尔蒙德大人已宣布你是上帝的敌人

translation.en: to incite his followers to kill you.
translation.zh: 以煽动他的追随者来杀你

translation.en: Aethelstan would not allow it.
translation.zh: 埃特尔斯坦不会允许这种事情的

translation.en: Which is why Ingilmundr seeks to keep his hands clean of it
translation.zh: 所以英吉尔蒙德想要表现得与此事毫无关系

translation.en: and has left the camp.
translation.zh: 所以他才会离开营帐

translation.en: To go where?
translation.zh: 为了去哪里？

translation.en: [Aldhelm] This way.
translation.zh: 这边

translation.en: Go up and around. There's no guard.
translation.zh: 上去转一圈 没有守卫

translation.en: Him. That is the man.
translation.zh: 他 就是那个男人

translation.en: What did you speak of with the pagan?
translation.zh: 你跟那个异教徒说了些什么？

translation.en: [sentry] Horsemen approach!
translation.zh: 骑兵进犯！

translation.en: [Osbert] Stay back from my gates and tell me who you are.
translation.zh: 远离我的城门 说明身份

translation.en: Lord Ingilmundr, and I come at Lord Uhtred's request.
translation.zh: 英吉尔蒙德大人和我应尤特雷德的要求而来

translation.en: He's delayed in Eoferwic as he renews his vow to the king.
translation.zh: 他在埃弗维克被耽误了因为他要向国王重申他的誓言

translation.en: He asked I help protect you.
translation.zh: 他要我帮忙保护你

translation.en: Protect from what?
translation.zh: 保护我什么？

translation.en: There is a rumor of Wolf-Warriors landed near Derwent.
translation.zh: 有传言说狼军已经在德温特附近登陆了

translation.en: [guard] Open the gate! Open the gate!
translation.zh: 打开城门！

translation.en: Do not give the order.
translation.zh: 不要下令

translation.en: Think on all we have shared.
translation.zh: 想想我们过去一起经历的一切

translation.en: You're lost from yourself, Aethelstan.
translation.zh: 你迷失了自我 埃特尔斯坦

translation.en: We fought together--
translation.zh: 我们曾并肩作战…

translation.en: And despite this, you drip poison against me and plot with Uhtred. -No. -Yes.
translation.zh: 尽管如此 你骗了我还与尤特雷德密谋

translation.en: -No. -Yes!
translation.zh: -没有-你有

translation.en: You turned your back, Aldhelm.
translation.zh: 你不仁 奥德海姆

translation.en: Now I turn mine.
translation.zh: 我不义

translation.en: [Eadgifu] Lord Ingilmundr, you bring welcome news of Lord Uhtred's supplication.
translation.zh: 英吉尔蒙德大人您带来了尤特雷德祈求的喜讯

translation.en: Will you journey south with me to let me bear witness to it?
translation.zh: 您愿意带我一起南下让我见证这一切吗？

translation.en: Lady, we have ridden hard to get here. At least let us rest a day or so.
translation.zh: 夫人 我们历尽艰辛才来到这里至少让我休息一天左右吧

translation.en: Oh, but I have been trapped in Bebbanburg a good while.
translation.zh: 但我被困在贝班堡已经很久了

translation.en: Believe me, you do not want to find yourself here longer than intended.
translation.zh: 相信我 您不会想在这里久留的

translation.en: -They've been warned! -[Finan] Now!
translation.zh: -他们收到了警告！-现在！

translation.en: We overtook you on the road.
translation.zh: 我们在路上超过了你

translation.en: Whatever power you hold over Aethelstan, today it ends.
translation.zh: 不管你对埃特尔斯坦有什么影响力今天都结束了

translation.en: [Ingilmundr grunts] My sword!
translation.zh: 我的剑！

translation.en: You still believe in Valhalla!
translation.zh: 你依然相信英灵殿堂

translation.en: Aethelstan cares for you. I will not divide us further.
translation.zh: 埃特尔斯坦很关心你我不会进一步分裂我们

translation.en: Put him below.
translation.zh: 把他关入地牢

translation.en: Christians amongst you, defend me! Who is your Lord?
translation.zh: 你们当中的基督徒保护我！你们的真主是谁？

translation.en: Lord Uhtred or the Lord Jesus Christ?
translation.zh: 尤特雷德领主还是耶稣基督？

translation.en: The people of Bebbanburg will not be divided by faith.
translation.zh: 贝班堡的人民不会被信仰分化

translation.en: Rise up, you fools!
translation.zh: 起来 你们这些白痴！

translation.en: Tell the king the terms of his release.
translation.zh: 告诉国王释放他的条件

translation.en: He makes peace with Northumbria and guarantees the border.
translation.zh: 与诺森布里亚和平相处保证边境安全

translation.en: -No one is forced to follow his god. -Yes, Lord.
translation.zh: -不会有人被迫追随他的神-是 领主

translation.en: Quite a price.
translation.zh: 开价挺高

translation.en: -Will Aethelstan agree? -[Uhtred] Let us hope so.
translation.zh: -埃特尔斯坦会同意吗？-希望如此吧

translation.en: He seems to discard his friends rather quickly now.
translation.zh: 他现在似乎很快就抛弃了他的朋友们

translation.en: [Ingilmundr] Truly, you bless an unworthy soul.
translation.zh: 你祝福了一个不配得到祝福的灵魂

translation.en: -May God reward your kindness. -Amen.
translation.zh: -愿主报答你的仁慈-阿门

translation.en: [Anlaf] Aethelstan turns against his friends.
translation.zh: 埃特尔斯坦背叛了他的朋友们

translation.en: Succumbs to a wild dream to be a monarch for all your land.
translation.zh: 屈从于一个疯狂的梦想想成为诸位领土的君主

translation.en: In time, he will come for you, Shetland.
translation.zh: 他迟早会来找你的 设得兰

translation.en: You, Orkney.
translation.zh: 你 奥克尼

translation.en: He will take what belonged to your forebears and call it Britain.
translation.zh: 他会夺走你们先祖的土地并称它为不列颠

translation.en: [Shetland] No.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: He barely sets his foot upon the water. Saxon country folk.
translation.zh: 他几乎没有涉足过水域撒克逊乡下人

translation.en: We can repel them.
translation.zh: 我们可以击退他们

translation.en: I'm not talking of repelling, but of meeting conquest with conquest.
translation.zh: 我不是在说击退 而是以征服对征服

translation.en: [Domnal] Scotland rejects your offer.
translation.zh: 苏格兰拒绝你的提议

translation.en: We cannot join with pagans to attack a man who's not threatened us.
translation.zh: 我们不能加入异教徒去攻击一个没有威胁到我们的人

translation.en: Christians do not choose war.
translation.zh: 基督徒不会选择战争

translation.en: War is coming.
translation.zh: 战争不请自来了

translation.en: You only have to choose a side.
translation.zh: 你只需要选择站在哪边

translation.en: [Ingilmundr] God be with you.
translation.zh: 上帝与你同在

translation.en: [Wassa] The stone was rolled away, as in the scripture.
translation.zh: 正如圣经所说 巨石被移走了

translation.en: It can only be the work of an angel.
translation.zh: 只有天使才能做到

translation.en: This way, Lord. Come and see the treasures.
translation.zh: 这边 领主 来看看这些珍宝吧

translation.en: [Sihtric] Lord!
translation.zh: 领主！

translation.en: What word from Eoferwic?
translation.zh: 埃弗维克的回答是什么？

translation.en: Does he accept my terms?
translation.zh: 他接受我的条件吗？

translation.en: I have no news.
translation.zh: 我没收到新消息

translation.en: Aethelstan is said to have returned to Winchester.
translation.zh: 据说 埃特尔斯坦回温切斯特了

translation.en: Well, let us take it as a good sign.
translation.zh: 我们把它当作是好兆头吧

translation.en: Perhaps without his shadow, Aethelstan sees more clearly.
translation.zh: 少了他的影子埃特尔斯坦也许看得更清楚了

translation.en: [Sihtric] What trouble brings you out here?
translation.zh: 你为什么会来这里？

translation.en: [Finan] The villagers were hunting for pagan silver.
translation.zh: 村民们正在猎取异教徒的银器

translation.en: Now they're saying it's a miracle.
translation.zh: 现在他们说这是个奇迹

translation.en: [Wassa] Make way for the King of Northumbria.
translation.zh: 为诺森布里亚国王让出道路

translation.en: I told you.
translation.zh: 我跟你说过的

translation.en: They think of you as a king.
translation.zh: 他们觉得你是国王

translation.en: [Finan] Do you think they hope to keep half for themselves?
translation.zh: 你觉得他们会想要自己留一半吗？

translation.en: [Sihtric] They likely took it from Bebbanburg in the first place.
translation.zh: 当初他们可能就是从贝班堡拿走的

translation.en: [man] You are detained in the name of King Aethelstan.
translation.zh: 以埃特尔斯坦国王之名 你被扣留了

translation.en: [Finan] Lord.
translation.zh: 领主

translation.en: We've been lured here.
translation.zh: 我们是被引诱来这里的

translation.en: You think?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: [Wassa] Lord, I'm sorry!
translation.zh: 领主 对不起！

translation.en: I'm sorry, Lord.
translation.zh: 对不起 领主

translation.en: The prisoner told me I had to, or I'd burn in the fires of hell.
translation.zh: 那个囚犯跟我说 我必须如此否则我就会被地狱之火焚烧

translation.en: I will never order to open the gates.
translation.zh: 我绝不会下令打开城门

translation.en: [man] Really?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: A gift from the king.
translation.zh: 国王的一个小礼物

translation.en: Aethelstan did this?
translation.zh: 这是埃特尔斯坦做的？

translation.en: It's what he does to traitors.
translation.zh: 这就是他对待叛徒的方式

translation.en: Open the gates or I slaughter your father.
translation.zh: 打开城门 否则我会将你父亲屠杀

translation.en: Comply and he will be spared.
translation.zh: 乖乖听话 他就能平安无事

translation.en: Do not open.
translation.zh: 不要开门

translation.en: -I can kill him in front of you. -Do not open!
translation.zh: -我可以在你面前杀了他-不要开门！

translation.en: -The choice is yours. -[Uhtred] Osbert! Do not open!
translation.zh: -选择权在你手上-奥斯伯特！不要开门！

translation.en: In your absence, Father, I command here.
translation.zh: 你不在的时候 父亲 这里由我指挥

translation.en: And I command that we open.
translation.zh: -我命令打开城门-不！

translation.en: -No! -[Sihtric] No, no, no!
translation.zh: -我命令打开城门-不！ 不！

translation.en: [guard] Drop your sword.
translation.zh: 放下剑

translation.en: Move.
translation.zh: 快走

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: Where is Aethelstan?
translation.zh: 埃特尔斯坦在哪里？

translation.en: In time.
translation.zh: 别急

translation.en: Bring me the Lady Eadgifu.
translation.zh: 把埃德吉夫夫人带过来

translation.en: Come. [grunts]
translation.zh: 快走

translation.en: [Eadgifu] I can walk.
translation.zh: 我自己会走

translation.en: [Eadgifu] Go on. Kill me.
translation.zh: 来啊 杀了我吧

translation.en: [Ingilmundr] You are to be placed in the community on Lindisfarne to protect your virtue.
translation.zh: 你将被安置在林迪斯法恩的社区以保护你的美德

translation.en: Did you hump the heathen, Lady?
translation.zh: 你是不是跟异教徒睡了 夫人？

translation.en: Confess.
translation.zh: 承认吧

translation.en: I confess
translation.zh: 我承认

translation.en: to have prayed for your excruciating death.
translation.zh: 曾祈祷你会痛苦地死去

translation.en: A no, then. You should have tried when you had the chance.
translation.zh: 那就是拒绝了有机会的时候 你应该抓紧试试看的

translation.en: We're taking your son to my garrison
translation.zh: 我们会把你儿子送去特威尔加入我的守军

translation.en: at Thelwael where he will be trained for battle.
translation.zh: 我们会把你儿子送去特威尔加入我的守军 -他会接受战斗训练-不 求你了

translation.en: No. No. Please.
translation.zh: -他会接受战斗训练-不 求你了

translation.en: -[guard] Move! -Your son also.
translation.zh: -快走！-你儿子也一样

translation.en: [Eadgifu] No. Edmund is the blood of Alfred. He should not be fodder for a shield wall! Please!
translation.zh: 不 埃德蒙是阿尔佛雷德的后代他不该成为盾墙的炮灰

translation.en: -[Osbert] I will take care of him. -Please!
translation.zh: -我会照顾他的-求你了

translation.en: The son of Uhtred stands for Wessex.
translation.zh: 尤特雷德之子代表了韦塞克斯

translation.en: [Finan] Hey! Hey!
translation.zh: 嘿！

translation.en: You, we have a plan for.
translation.zh: 至于你呢 我们自有安排

translation.en: -[Uhtred] Am I to be drowned in the sea? -[Ingilmundr] I never quite know his mind.
translation.zh: -我会被淹死在海中吗？-我一向不太清楚他的想法

translation.en: [Uhtred] Do not punish those in Bebbanburg.
translation.zh: 不要惩罚贝班堡里的人他要对抗的人是我

translation.en: -His fight is with me. -His fight is elsewhere.
translation.zh: 不要惩罚贝班堡里的人他要对抗的人是我 他要在别的地方战斗

translation.en: How lucky we have found ourselves so close to the Scottish border.
translation.zh: 我们离苏格兰边境这么近真是太幸运了

translation.en: No, do not invade Scotland. You will lose hundreds of men.
translation.zh: 不 不要侵入苏格兰你会折损数百人的

translation.en: And unleash a war for generations.
translation.zh: 还会引发一场几代人的战争

translation.en: The king has no successor to fear for. It makes him strong.
translation.zh: 国王没有后继者可担心这让他变得坚强

translation.en: Do whatever you must to protect our sons. Do not fight him. Just capitulate.
translation.zh: 尽你所能保护我们的儿子不要对抗他 投降就好

translation.en: Anything else is foolish.
translation.zh: 除此之外的都是愚蠢之举

translation.en: -Aldhelm never betrayed you. -All of you betrayed me.
translation.zh: -奥德海姆从未背叛过你-你们全都背叛了我

translation.en: All those I thought as friends.
translation.zh: 所有我以为是朋友的人

translation.en: Swear now, before Bebbanburg, and I will spare your life.
translation.zh: 现在就在贝班堡前宣誓然后我就饶你一命

translation.en: -No. -Then you leave me with no choice.
translation.zh: -不可能-那我也别无他选了

translation.en: Aethelstan.
translation.zh: 埃特尔斯坦

translation.en: I cannot.
translation.zh: 我做不到

translation.en: -Let me offer my-- -No.
translation.zh: -让我帮…-不用

translation.en: Take everything from him.
translation.zh: 把他的东西全部拿走

translation.en: I banish you from my lands to travel the earth and seas alone.
translation.zh: 我下令将你驱逐出我的领土独自浪迹天涯

translation.en: On pain of murder of your son.
translation.zh: 否则你儿子将被处死

translation.en: Let none feed or clothe him, lest become my enemy.
translation.zh: 不要给他吃穿之物否则就是我的敌人

translation.en: Go.
translation.zh: 走吧

translation.en: Before this mercy vanishes.
translation.zh: 趁这仁慈还未消逝

translation.en: [Hywel] Turn back. There is still time.
translation.zh: 回去 还有时间

translation.en: The Scots are no threat.
translation.zh: 苏格兰人不足为惧

translation.en: This will damn you, Lord King.
translation.zh: 这会毁了您的 国王陛下

translation.en: [Hywel] To save us from the pagans can be a just endeavor.
translation.zh: 将我们从异教徒的手中救出是一种正义之举

translation.en: But to turn on other Christians is ungodly.
translation.zh: 但背叛其他基督徒则是十恶不赦之举

translation.en: [Hywel] Your men do not want this fight. [Aethelstan] Well, perhaps I need better men.
translation.zh: -您的手下并不想打这场仗-也许我需要找些更好的手下

translation.en: Perhaps I should summon your son.
translation.zh: 也许我应该把你儿子召来

translation.en: Lord King!
translation.zh: 国王陛下！

translation.en: Aethelstan has attacked settlements in the lowlands.
translation.zh: 埃特尔斯坦袭击了低地的定居点

translation.en: He cannot raid us without reply.
translation.zh: 我们需要奋起反击

translation.en: Do I tell Anlaf you are ready to meet with him and the other kings?
translation.zh: 要我去告诉安拉夫 你已经准备好跟他以及其他国王见面了吗？

translation.en: Uhtred the Daneslayer.
translation.zh: 丹麦人终结者尤特雷德

translation.en: You killed my cousin Gelf at the battle of Beamfleot.
translation.zh: 你在贝姆弗洛特战役中杀了我的表亲 盖尔夫

translation.en: Send word we have found him.
translation.zh: 把消息传出去 我们找到他了

translation.en: I hated Gelf.
translation.zh: 我恨死盖尔夫了

translation.en: Take him to the king.
translation.zh: 带他去见国王

translation.en: [Uhtred] Where are you taking me?
translation.zh: 你们要带我去哪里？

translation.en: [woman] To the very north of these islands.
translation.zh: 去这些岛的最北端

translation.en: -[Uhtred] What do you give thanks for? -For the great battle to come.
translation.zh: 你们在感谢什么？ 感谢即将到来的大战

translation.en: Tell the jarl we're here with the King of Northumbria.
translation.zh: 告诉首领我们带着诺森布里亚国王来了

translation.en: -[Uhtred] All folk of Shetland? -[woman] Some of Man and Orkney join us.
translation.zh: -设得兰的所有人？-马恩和奥克尼的一些人加入了我们

translation.en: With their kings. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 和他们的国王一起

translation.en: [Anlaf] Is this who they claim? The King of Northumbria?
translation.zh: 他们说的就是这个人吗？诺森布里亚国王？

translation.en: [Constantin] Aye, it's him.
translation.zh: 对 是他

translation.en: -I am no king. -[Anlaf] No.
translation.zh: -我不是国王-对

translation.en: But you could be.
translation.zh: 但你可以是

translation.en: Sit. You are amongst friends.
translation.zh: 坐下 在座的都是朋友

translation.en: [Uhtred] You join with pagans?
translation.zh: 你加入了异教徒？

translation.en: Aethelstan has taken an axe to the truce.
translation.zh: 埃特尔斯坦撕毁了停战协议

translation.en: A truce you brokered.
translation.zh: 一个由你促成的停战协议

translation.en: What he has done in the villages of the lowlands--
translation.zh: 他在低地村落的所作所为…

translation.en: -Is it worse than his cruelty in Irland? -Tales to spread fear.
translation.zh: 比他在爱尔兰的恶行更甚？ -散布恐惧的传言-我们别无选择 唯有迎战

translation.en: [Constantin] We had no choice but to defend ourselves.
translation.zh: -散布恐惧的传言-我们别无选择 唯有迎战

translation.en: We did not start this.
translation.zh: 这不是我们挑起的

translation.en: -How did you find me? Who's your spy? -We have many spies. We know many things.
translation.zh: -你们怎么找到我的？密探是谁？-我们有许多密探 我们知道很多事

translation.en: [Constantin] We know Aethelstan has banished you. And we know he gets humped like a woman.
translation.zh: -我们知道你被埃特尔斯坦驱逐了-我们知道他像娘们儿一样被人上

translation.en: That may be customary to you pagans,
translation.zh: 这也许是你们异教徒的习俗

translation.en: but as a Christian, it cannot be endured.
translation.zh: 但作为基督徒 这是不能容忍的

translation.en: -He endures it often, from what I hear. -So…
translation.zh: -据我所知 他经常忍受这事-所以…

translation.en: As a man who shares our enemy,
translation.zh: 作为一个和我们有共同敌人的人

translation.en: we ask you to join with us, Uhtred, in our alliance.
translation.zh: 我们邀请你加入我们的联盟 尤特雷德

translation.en: Stand against the tyrant.
translation.zh: 对抗暴君

translation.en: I'm heartsick of battles.
translation.zh: 我已厌倦了战争

translation.en: What has become of the warrior? Do you no longer yearn for Valhalla?
translation.zh: 这位勇士是怎么了？你不再向往英灵殿堂了吗？

translation.en: Do you know the prophecy, Uhtred?
translation.zh: 你知道那个预言吗 尤特雷德？

translation.en: The ancient prophecy of my people?
translation.zh: 我的子民的古老预言？

translation.en: All of Britain will unite against the Saxons,
translation.zh: 整个不列颠会为了对抗撒克逊人而联合起来

translation.en: push them into the Kentish sea,
translation.zh: 将他们赶入肯特海

translation.en: return the feals to the line of Arthur.
translation.zh: 将忠诚之人还给亚瑟一系

translation.en: [Anlaf] There. The vision of an old man.
translation.zh: 这是一个老人的幻象

translation.en: -So it must be true. -We Northumbrians also have a prophecy.
translation.zh: -所以肯定是真的-我们诺森布里亚也有一个预言

translation.en: "Seven kings must die."
translation.zh: “七王崩”

translation.en: That holds no fear.
translation.zh: 这一点都不可怕

translation.en: Each man here has a son to take his place.
translation.zh: 在座的每个人都有儿子可以继位

translation.en: [Owain] Seven kings die, seven will, in that moment, be made.
translation.zh: 七王死去 同时也会有七王诞生

translation.en: [Anlaf] It's true.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: If you make a child, your kingdom stands beyond you.
translation.zh: 有了孩子你的王国就能超越你而续存

translation.en: A kingdom ravaged by war, yes.
translation.zh: 一个被战争毁坏的王国 是的

translation.en: [Constantin] Then there is another way to consider.
translation.zh: 那还有别的方法可以考虑

translation.en: If you wish to save many from bloodshed.
translation.zh: 如果你愿意救众人于水火

translation.en: Kill one man only.
translation.zh: 只需杀掉一人

translation.en: Kill the king who has attacked us all.
translation.zh: 杀掉那个袭击了我们大家的国王

translation.en: Return to him in… supplication.
translation.zh: 祈求…回到他身边

translation.en: Seize the moment.
translation.zh: 伺机而动

translation.en: Save many lives by simply taking one.
translation.zh: 只要取一条性命就能拯救很多人

translation.en: [Anlaf] The alternative, of course, is war.
translation.zh: 另一个选择当然就是战争

translation.en: Seven kings against one.
translation.zh: 七王对一王

translation.en: If Aethelstan wanted to unite the tribes of Britain,
translation.zh: 如果埃特尔斯坦想要统一不列颠各族

translation.en: he has succeeded.
translation.zh: 他已经成功了

translation.en: [Anlaf] Why do you seek us here?
translation.zh: 你来此找我们所为何事？

translation.en: Your part is to keep Winchester aroused.
translation.zh: 你的任务是让温切斯特保持亢奋

translation.en: You let Uhtred go free. Why?
translation.zh: 你放走了尤特雷德 为什么？

translation.en: I sent him away.
translation.zh: 我把他送走了

translation.en: To kill your friend, the king.
translation.zh: 去杀掉你的朋友 国王

translation.en: -Well, he will be killed in the attempt. -[woman chuckles]
translation.zh: 他必定会出师未捷身先死

translation.en: Uhtred has skills you do not.
translation.zh: 尤特雷德有着你不了解的能力

translation.en: He attacks Aethelstan. Aethelstan attacks him.
translation.zh: 他攻击埃特尔斯坦埃特尔斯坦攻击他

translation.en: It barely matters.
translation.zh: 这一点都不重要

translation.en: Either way, we face in battle men whose spirits have been broken.
translation.zh: 两种情况 我们在战场上面对的都是精神崩溃之人

translation.en: Ingilmundr, go to the West. The time is near.
translation.zh: 英吉尔蒙德 去西边 时机已近

translation.en: Astrid, watch our friends in Northumbria.
translation.zh: 阿斯特丽德看着我们在诺森布里亚的朋友

translation.en: [Aethelstan] I did not think I would see you again.
translation.zh: 我没想到会再见到你

translation.en: Lord King.
translation.zh: 国王陛下

translation.en: In the name of my son, I beg forgiveness.
translation.zh: 以我儿子之名 我祈求得到宽恕

translation.en: Spare him.
translation.zh: 放了他

translation.en: Let me kneel to you.
translation.zh: 接受我的宣誓

translation.en: Then I lift your banishment.
translation.zh: 那我就解除对你的驱逐令

translation.en: Give me a sword and then leave us.
translation.zh: 给我一把剑 然后全都出去

translation.en: Go on, then.
translation.zh: 来吧

translation.en: Do it.
translation.zh: 开始吧

translation.en: I swear this on my son's life.
translation.zh: 我以我儿子之命发誓

translation.en: Hear this as an oath.
translation.zh: 请听我的誓言

translation.en: Ingilmundr is a spy.
translation.zh: 英吉尔蒙德是间谍

translation.en: He's working with Anlaf to ally British kings against you.
translation.zh: 他和安拉夫合作让不列颠的国王联合起来对付你

translation.en: -Lies. -It is true. I saw him in Shetland.
translation.zh: -谎言-这是真的 我在设得兰见到他了

translation.en: He told Anlaf's warriors to track me. They tried to turn me--
translation.zh: 他让安拉夫的战士追踪我他们试图策反我…

translation.en: No! [grunts]
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: -He is in Thelwael with your son! -He told them things of you.
translation.zh: -他和你儿子一起在特威尔-他向他们通报你的消息

translation.en: He still follows my gods.
translation.zh: 他依然追随着我的众神

translation.en: For now, you have an advantage.
translation.zh: 目前 你仍有优势

translation.en: Ingilmundr does not know he has been discovered.
translation.zh: 英吉尔蒙德不知道他已经暴露了

translation.en: [Aethelstan] No, he would not betray me. If anything, I have betrayed him.
translation.zh: 不 他不会背叛我的就算有什么 也是我背叛了他

translation.en: -No. -He is a man of God, and I am a sinner!
translation.zh: -不-他是上帝的子民 而我是罪人！

translation.en: He has convinced you of this to provoke your campaign.
translation.zh: 他让你相信了这一点是为了煽动你挑起战争

translation.en: -To unite your enemies. -No!
translation.zh: -以团结你的敌人-不！

translation.en: Aethelstan, please see this. This alliance he has gathered is too large.
translation.zh: 埃特尔斯坦 请看清楚他集结的这个联盟太过强大

translation.en: -Your lands will be overrun. -No! You lie!
translation.zh: -你的领土会被占领的-不！你骗人！

translation.en: This is all lies!
translation.zh: 这些全是谎言！

translation.en: Aethelstan, please hear me.
translation.zh: 埃特尔斯坦 请听我说

translation.en: Why would I lie to you?
translation.zh: 我为什么要骗你？

translation.en: -Get out. -Aethelstan--
translation.zh: -出去-埃特尔斯坦…

translation.en: Get out. Get from my sight! Guards!
translation.zh: 出去 滚出我的视线！护卫！

translation.en: -[door opens] -Take him!
translation.zh: 带他走！

translation.en: [guard] You dog! On your way.
translation.zh: 丧家犬！快滚吧

translation.en: [Sihtric] We search every forest, every valley.
translation.zh: 我们寻遍森林与山谷

translation.en: [Finan] And here he is, back in the lap of luxury.
translation.zh: 而他却在这里 回到了奢华之地

translation.en: We heard you needed us.
translation.zh: 我们听说你需要我们

translation.en: Truly the gods smiled at me to give me such friends.
translation.zh: 上帝保佑我能有这么好的朋友

translation.en: [Finan] Let's find ourselves an alehouse, make a plan.
translation.zh: 我们去找个酒馆 计划一下

translation.en: -Who told you I was here? -[Sihtric] She said you called for us.
translation.zh: -谁告诉你们我在这里的？-她说你在找我们

translation.en: -Did you not send for us, Lord? -She said you needed us. And requested a guard.
translation.zh: -不是你说的吗 领主？-她说你需要我们保护

translation.en: Danish girl, serves in Aethelstan's court.
translation.zh: 丹麦女孩 在埃特尔斯坦的王宫效力

translation.en: Finan, I sent no word.
translation.zh: 菲南 我没找人传过话

translation.en: No command for you to leave Bebbanburg.
translation.zh: 没有下令让你们离开贝班堡

translation.en: -[Sihtric] Stay here and guard the gates. -[man] Yes, Lord.
translation.zh: -留在这里 守住城门-是 领主

translation.en: [Uhtred] Wolf-Warriors.
translation.zh: 狼军

translation.en: [Uhtred] This is Anlaf's doing.
translation.zh: 这是安拉夫的手笔

translation.en: [Finan] Ingrith!
translation.zh: 英格丽德！

translation.en: [Sihtric] Lord, where are they all?
translation.zh: 领主 人都去哪里了？

translation.en: -[Uhtred] Eadgifu? -Uhtred.
translation.zh: -埃德吉夫-尤特雷德

translation.en: What happened?
translation.zh: 发生了什么事？

translation.en: [Eadgifu] When news reached us of the attack and torture here,
translation.zh: 我们收到消息说这里会被袭击和折磨时

translation.en: the abbess sent us to help the injured.
translation.zh: 女修道院长派我们过来帮助伤员

translation.en: But we cannot get to the injured.
translation.zh: 但我们无法接触到伤员

translation.en: Where… Where is she? Where's my wife?
translation.zh: 她在哪里？我老婆呢？

translation.en: "Seven kings must die," Lord.
translation.zh: “七王崩” 大人

translation.en: "Seven kings
translation.zh: “七王”

translation.en: and the woman you love."
translation.zh: “以及你心爱的女人”

translation.en: Ingrith!
translation.zh: 英格丽德！

translation.en: -No. Ingrith! -Every man is to help move it.
translation.zh: -英格丽德！-所有人都帮忙一起挪走它

translation.en: You, up above.
translation.zh: 你 上去

translation.en: -[Finan] Can anyone hear me? -[Uhtred] Watch for signs of Anlaf's men.
translation.zh: -有人能听到我说话吗？-注意安拉夫手下的踪迹！

translation.en: We tried to help, but all we could do was comfort them.
translation.zh: 我们试过想帮忙但我们能做的只是安慰他们

translation.en: Uhtred, Ingrith said they threatened to return.
translation.zh: 尤特雷德 英格丽德说他们威胁说还会回来的

translation.en: -We must secure ourselves. -Not until we rescue those within.
translation.zh: -我们必须保护自己-那也要等救出里面的人才行

translation.en: When did you speak last?
translation.zh: 你们最后一次对话是什么时候？

translation.en: About three days ago.
translation.zh: 大约三天前

translation.en: -[Finan] Get the rope up there! -[man grunts]
translation.zh: 把绳子拉上去！

translation.en: [Finan] Come on!
translation.zh: 快点！

translation.en: [Finan] Pull!
translation.zh: 拉！

translation.en: [Finan] Pull!
translation.zh: 拉！

translation.en: Pull!
translation.zh: 拉！

translation.en: Pull!
translation.zh: 拉！

translation.en: Now!
translation.zh: 用力！

translation.en: Finan.
translation.zh: 菲南

translation.en: Where is…
translation.zh: 在哪里…

translation.en: [in anguish] No!
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: [Uhtred] I brought this on them.
translation.zh: 是我害了他们

translation.en: What they suffered is on Anlaf's account.
translation.zh: 他们所遭受的一切 都是安拉夫的错

translation.en: You cannot let this break you.
translation.zh: 你不能就此倒下

translation.en: We are broken.
translation.zh: 我们已经破败

translation.en: We have no allies. We're lost.
translation.zh: 我们没有盟军 我们输了

translation.en: Then we must find the courage to defend Northumbria from their return.
translation.zh: 那我们必须寻得勇气在他们回到诺森布里亚时奋起反抗

translation.en: If we endure and keep them at siege,
translation.zh: 如果我们坚守到底 把他们困住

translation.en: we will give those in other parts of England time to prepare.
translation.zh: 我们就能为英格兰其他地区的人争取到时间准备

translation.en: Whatever we suffer protects those we are apart from.
translation.zh: 我们遭受的一切能保护那些与我们分开的人

translation.en: [Sihtric] She's right, Lord.
translation.zh: 她说得对 领主

translation.en: Osbert can cross the Irish Sea, get to--
translation.zh: 奥斯伯特可以横渡爱尔兰海 抵达…

translation.en: The Irish Sea?
translation.zh: 爱尔兰海？

translation.en: We must find the fastest horses. I think Anlaf is hoping to turn all eyes here.
translation.zh: 我们必须找到最快的马匹我猜安拉夫想把注意力全吸引到这里

translation.en: To lure Aethelstan.
translation.zh: 为了引诱埃特尔斯坦

translation.en: But they will land where they have men. Ingilmundr holds a garrison in the Wirral.
translation.zh: 但他们会在有自己人的地方登陆英吉尔蒙德率领的守军在威勒尔

translation.en: With… With our sons.
translation.zh: 和我们的儿子在一起

translation.en: [Osbert] Something's underway.
translation.zh: 有事情发生了

translation.en: -[men shouting] -[Osbert] Get in the cart.
translation.zh: 上车

translation.en: Those of you with swords to your throats face a decision.
translation.zh: 被利剑顶住喉咙的人需要做出一个决定

translation.en: A thousand ships are heading towards these shores.
translation.zh: 一千艘船正在驶向海岸

translation.en: Some have already landed.
translation.zh: 有些已经登陆了

translation.en: Within a week, Saxon boroughs will be overrun.
translation.zh: 一周之内 撒克逊地区将被占领

translation.en: Join us and fight the tyrant Aethelstan,
translation.zh: 加入我们对抗暴君埃特尔斯坦

translation.en: or die.
translation.zh: 否则杀无赦

translation.en: For King Ed--
translation.zh: 为国王爱德…

translation.en: -[Osbert] Keep still. -[man] This way!
translation.zh: 别动

translation.en: We saw them, but they got away.
translation.zh: 我们看到他们了 但被他们给逃了

translation.en: -There. Far away. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -那边 很远-谢谢

translation.en: [woman] Yes, my lord.
translation.zh: 是 大人

translation.en: [Sihtric] No word from Thelwael, Lord.
translation.zh: 特威尔没有消息传来 领主

translation.en: Sihtric.
translation.zh: 希特里克

translation.en: Lord?
translation.zh: 领主？

translation.en: Do we finally face defeat?
translation.zh: 我们终于要面对失败了吗？

translation.en: All the warrior kings that I've known, Ubba, Cnut, Bloodhair,
translation.zh: 我认识的所有骁勇之王乌巴 克努特 血缕

translation.en: all have faced defeat in the end and have taken others with them.
translation.zh: 每个人最终都失败了还带走了其他人

translation.en: The fight was always coming, Lord. No warrior dies a peaceful death.
translation.zh: 战争总会来临 领主没有任何勇士能安详地死去

translation.en: She saw it all. "Seven kings must die."
translation.zh: 她全都看到了 “七王崩”

translation.en: We have hope.
translation.zh: 我们还有希望

translation.en: In your heart, you never wanted to be a king.
translation.zh: 在您心里 您从未想过要称王

translation.en: [Eadgifu] Have those fleeing heard anything of my son?
translation.zh: 那些逃出来的人有我儿子的消息吗？

translation.en: Then until I know for sure,
translation.zh: 那在我收到确切消息之前

translation.en: he is alive.
translation.zh: 他都还活着

translation.en: And if conquest is easy, perhaps Anlaf may be satisfied with Mercia.
translation.zh: 如果占领轻而易举也许麦西亚就能让安拉夫满足了

translation.en: -It is fertile-- -[Uhtred] He will not be satisfied.
translation.zh: -那里很肥沃…-他是不会满足的

translation.en: They come Viking now to extinguish an idea of England.
translation.zh: 他们维京人来此是为了覆灭英格兰的目标

translation.en: A dream unites a people who once sought to kill each other.
translation.zh: 是为了统一一个互相厮杀的民族的梦想

translation.en: Without it, we go back into an age of darkness.
translation.zh: 没有它 我们将重归黑暗时代

translation.en: We have both lost so much.
translation.zh: 我们都失去了太多

translation.en: But I ask myself…
translation.zh: 但我扪心自问…

translation.en: am I alive?
translation.zh: 我是否还活着？

translation.en: Can you feel it?
translation.zh: 你能感觉到吗？

translation.en: [Uhtred] You are alive.
translation.zh: 你还活着

translation.en: So are you.
translation.zh: 你也是

translation.en: So we have hope.
translation.zh: 所以我们还有希望

translation.en: [Uhtred] Edmund?
translation.zh: 埃德蒙？

translation.en: Osbert?
translation.zh: 奥斯伯特？

translation.en: [Eadgifu] Edmund?
translation.zh: 埃德蒙？

translation.en: I came seeking Ingilmundr.
translation.zh: 我前来寻找英吉尔蒙德

translation.en: To prove that you had lied to me.
translation.zh: 证明你骗了我

translation.en: But you had not.
translation.zh: 但你没有

translation.en: [Uhtred] We came to search for our sons.
translation.zh: 我们是来找我们的儿子的

translation.en: Bring out Osbert and Edmund.
translation.zh: 把奥斯伯特和埃德蒙带出来

translation.en: [Uhtred] Osbert!
translation.zh: 奥斯伯特！

translation.en: [Aethelstan] They hid themselves and were spared the massacre.
translation.zh: 他们躲了起来 躲过了屠杀

translation.en: [Eadgifu] Lord King, you have my endless gratitude.
translation.zh: 国王陛下 我感激不尽

translation.en: [Aethelstan] I've not been myself this past year, and truly, truly, I…
translation.zh: 过去这一年 我迷失了自己 真的 我…

translation.en: I pay for my sins.
translation.zh: 我为我的罪孽付出了代价

translation.en: I face a great alliance at Brunanburh.
translation.zh: 我在布鲁南堡遭遇了强大的盟军

translation.en: All regret is worthless.
translation.zh: 悔恨毫无意义

translation.en: Let us speak only of the fight to come.
translation.zh: 让我们着眼于即将到来的大战吧

translation.en: -Osbert, what have you learnt? -They've set up camp on high ground.
translation.zh: -奥斯伯特 你有什么消息？-他们在高地扎营

translation.en: And they have six armies.
translation.zh: 他们有六支军队

translation.en: Then seven armies shall meet at Brunanburh.
translation.zh: 七军应该在布鲁南堡汇合

translation.en: I do not want you to fight for me, Uhtred.
translation.zh: 我不想让你为我而战 尤特雷德

translation.en: -[Uhtred] Trust I'm on your side-- -I know that.
translation.zh: -相信我 我是支持你…-我知道

translation.en: Save yourself.
translation.zh: 保全你自己

translation.en: Take your son to safety.
translation.zh: 把你儿子带去安全之地

translation.en: If I do not survive the battle, then succession will be secure.
translation.zh: 如果我战死那王位继承也能得到保障

translation.en: You cannot fight this alliance alone. [Aethelstan] Yet I forbid you from taking part.
translation.zh: -你不能独自对抗这支盟军-但我禁止你参战

translation.en: Take him, Father Pyrlig. Please, take them all.
translation.zh: 带他走 皮耶利格神父拜托 把他们全都带走

translation.en: -I've dragged you all to this fate. -[Uhtred] Let us serve you.
translation.zh: -是我将你们拖进了这深渊-让我们为你效力

translation.en: Aethelstan…
translation.zh: 埃特尔斯坦…

translation.en: this is not a punishment.
translation.zh: 这不是惩罚

translation.en: I think we both know that it is.
translation.zh: 我想你我都清楚 这就是惩罚

translation.en: [Uhtred] This is martyrdom.
translation.zh: 这是殉道

translation.en: He will not survive so great a number.
translation.zh: 这样的大军 他不可能活下来的

translation.en: But we have been reprieved.
translation.zh: 但我们已经得到了赦免

translation.en: -God is telling us to get to safety. -Your god does not speak to me.
translation.zh: -上帝让我们去安全之地-你的上帝可没跟我说过

translation.en: It is not cowardly to spurn a battle that cannot be won.
translation.zh: 放弃一场没有胜算的争战这不是懦弱

translation.en: It is.
translation.zh: 这就是懦弱

translation.en: However this prevails, I will have to know I walked away from danger.
translation.zh: 不管结果如何我都知道自己逃避了危险

translation.en: Your battles will come
translation.zh: 你的战争会到来的

translation.en: when you become king.
translation.zh: 等你登上王位

translation.en: King of where, Mother?
translation.zh: 哪里的国王 母亲？

translation.en: -We will fight with the shield wall. -No.
translation.zh: 我们将与盾墙并肩作战 -不-奥斯伯特

translation.en: -Osbert, are you ready? -I've always been ready.
translation.zh: -你准备好了吗？-时刻准备着

translation.en: Pyrlig, you once told me that it was my destiny to save England.
translation.zh: 皮耶利格 你曾跟我说拯救英格兰是我的宿命

translation.en: Hadn't seen it quite like this, but then I'm not one for prophecies.
translation.zh: 从未见过这种情形 但我不相信预言

translation.en: [Eadgifu] What if your destiny is to protect Edmund?
translation.zh: 万一你的宿命是保护埃德蒙呢？

translation.en: Perhaps he is the one to unite England. He could be the king who was worthy.
translation.zh: 也许他就是能统一英格兰的人他可以成为当之无愧的国王

translation.en: No king will form England.
translation.zh: 没有国王能够统一英格兰

translation.en: This is what I see now.
translation.zh: 这就是我目前所见的结果

translation.en: Not Edmund or Edward or Alfred. Not even Aethelstan.
translation.zh: 埃德蒙或爱德华或阿尔佛雷德都不行就算埃特尔斯坦也不行

translation.en: Alfred's dream was of a united people.
translation.zh: 阿尔佛雷德的梦想是团结人民

translation.en: And with these men, from all parts, I fought for it.
