translation.zh: 和这些来自各地的人一起我会为它而战

translation.en: What if our destiny was not to form England,
translation.zh: 如果我们的宿命不是统一英格兰

translation.en: but to form the English as one force?
translation.zh: 而是让英国人团结起来呢？

translation.en: Who better than a half Saxon, half Dane to lead men from divided places?
translation.zh: 谁会比一个撒克逊与丹麦血统各半的人更适合领导一群来自各地的人？

translation.en: [Uhtred] We go!
translation.zh: 我们走吧！

translation.en: I don't have to call myself English, do I?
translation.zh: 我不用说自己是英国人吧？

translation.en: -[grunting] -[yelling]
translation.zh: （威勒尔半岛 布兰博罗）

translation.en: To hear that, you'd think they'd won already.
translation.zh: 听这动静 还以为他们已经胜利了呢

translation.en: [Uhtred] We should make our way. If this is to work, we need to be on the front line.
translation.zh: 我们该走了要想成功 我们需要去前线

translation.en: -We'll aim for their left side. -Why?
translation.zh: -我们瞄准他们的左边-为什么？

translation.en: Why the left?
translation.zh: 为什么是左边？

translation.en: Weaker. Most men fight with the sword in their right hand.
translation.zh: 较弱 大部分人都是右手持剑战斗的

translation.en: I've fought with Uhtred many times. Trust he will find a way.
translation.zh: 我们和尤特雷德并肩作战很多次了相信他会有办法的

translation.en: You.
translation.zh: 你

translation.en: Where did you find that?
translation.zh: 你在哪里找到它的？

translation.en: I bought it in Aegelesburg for five pieces.
translation.zh: 我在伊盖尔斯堡用五个硬币买的

translation.en: May I?
translation.zh: 我可以看看吗？

translation.en: I will exchange it for this one.
translation.zh: 我用这把剑跟你交换

translation.en: It is worth much more, and it has a garnet.
translation.zh: 这把剑更值钱 而且还有颗石榴石

translation.en: When I say exchange, I mean you take that one, and I keep this one.
translation.zh: 我说交换的意思就是那把剑归你 这把剑归我

translation.en: [Uhtred] I am no commander of yours.
translation.zh: 我不是你们的指挥官

translation.en: I have no authority other than being a man who has fought in many battles.
translation.zh: 除了身经百战我不比任何人更加权威

translation.en: Some of you I have led before.
translation.zh: 我曾率领过你们中的某些人

translation.en: Today I stand with you as a simple soldier.
translation.zh: 今天 我以普通士兵的身份与你们站在一起

translation.en: But I ask that, on the field, you once again let me guide you.
translation.zh: 但我请求在战场上你们能允许我再次带领你们

translation.en: Our position on the hill is weak,
translation.zh: 我们在山上的阵地很脆弱

translation.en: but the trees to our left give us an advantage the enemy will not see.
translation.zh: 但我们左边的树丛为我们提供了不被敌人发现的掩护

translation.en: We can defeat them
translation.zh: 只要团结一致

translation.en: if we stay united.
translation.zh: 我们就能打败他们

translation.en: -This is one way to clear the ale. -Smell of a thousand armpits.
translation.zh: -这是消除宿醉的好办法-像一千个腋窝的味道

translation.en: [Finan] Aye. Maybe they smelled us and ran away.
translation.zh: 是啊 也许他们闻到我们的气味逃走了

translation.en: -[Sihtric] Maybe. -[Finan] Who touched my arse?
translation.zh: -也许吧-谁摸我屁股？

translation.en: Oh my God!
translation.zh: 我的天！

translation.en: [soldier] Jesus!
translation.zh: 天啊！

translation.en: Rather a lot of them, isn't there?
translation.zh: 千军万马哦

translation.en: [Edmund] Uhtred?
translation.zh: 尤特雷德？

translation.en: Uhtred.
translation.zh: 尤特雷德

translation.en: -How do we face this? -You see these bags?
translation.zh: -我们要怎么对抗他们？-看到那些袋子了吗？

translation.en: Give them to the men on the front line. Go.
translation.zh: 把它们拿去给前线的人 快去

translation.en: [Uhtred] Do not raise your shield until you have to.
translation.zh: 除非必要 不要举盾

translation.en: Stay at ease. Stay relaxed.
translation.zh: 别紧张 保持放松

translation.en: -And do not show them we are unsettled. -[Finan] Lord!
translation.zh: -别让他们看出我们的不安-领主！他来了

translation.en: [Anlaf] Here he comes. The tyrant himself.
translation.zh: 他来了 暴君本人

translation.en: [Uhtred] Is it done?
translation.zh: 完成了吗？

translation.en: -Get back as far as you can. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -尽量退到后面去-好的

translation.en: [commander] Shield wall!
translation.zh: 盾墙！

translation.en: -Are we ready, arselings? -[soldiers] Yeah!
translation.zh: -准备好了吗 各位？-好了！

translation.en: I have taken their confessions.
translation.zh: 我已经接受了他们的忏悔

translation.en: When I ask you to give ground,
translation.zh: 当我要求你们撤退时

translation.en: do it.
translation.zh: 照做

translation.en: When you see the trees in front of you, it will be time.
translation.zh: 当你们看到树在眼前时 时机就到了

translation.en: Do you think this will work?
translation.zh: 你觉得这样可行吗？

translation.en: If it does not, we will not be here to see it.
translation.zh: 如果不行 我们也看不到了

translation.en: Trust me.
translation.zh: 相信我

translation.en: And follow.
translation.zh: 跟我走

translation.en: Shield wall!
translation.zh: 盾墙！

translation.en: Shield!
translation.zh: 盾

translation.en: Wall!
translation.zh: 墙！

translation.en: Step back!
translation.zh: 退后！

translation.en: Back!
translation.zh: 退后！

translation.en: They retreat?
translation.zh: 他们撤退了？

translation.en: Even before we engage?
translation.zh: 我们还没动手就撤？

translation.en: -Step back! -[Anlaf] They know they have lost already.
translation.zh: -退后！-他们知道自己已经输了

translation.en: Let's enjoy it.
translation.zh: 好好享受吧

translation.en: -[commander] Forward! -[soldiers grunt]
translation.zh: 前进！

translation.en: I thank God, who I serve with pure conscience.
translation.zh: 感谢上帝我追随的人有着纯洁的良知

translation.en: God hath not given us a spirit of fear, but of power…
translation.zh: 上帝赐予我们的不是恐惧 是力量

translation.en: -[soldiers grunt] -…and of sound mind!
translation.zh: 是爱 还有清醒的头脑！

translation.en: [Finan] Amen.
translation.zh: 阿门

translation.en: [Uhtred] Step back!
translation.zh: 退后！

translation.en: Brace!
translation.zh: 挡箭！

translation.en: [commander] Re-form! Charge!
translation.zh: 重新列队！进攻！

translation.en: Saxon bastards!
translation.zh: 撒克逊混蛋！

translation.en: [Uhtred] Pyrlig!
translation.zh: 皮耶利格！

translation.en: No! [echoes]
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: Pyrlig!
translation.zh: 皮耶利格！

translation.en: -Two paces! One pace! -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 两步！一步！听我指挥！

translation.en: -On my command! -[Finan] Let's hope this works!
translation.zh: 两步！一步！听我指挥！ 希望能成功！

translation.en: Two paces back!
translation.zh: 后退两步！

translation.en: Back!
translation.zh: 退！

translation.en: Step back!
translation.zh: 退后！

translation.en: One pace back!
translation.zh: 后退一步！

translation.en: [Anlaf] They back off. We have them.
translation.zh: 他们退缩了 我们赢了

translation.en: -Find the king! -[Anlaf] Find the king!
translation.zh: -找到国王！-找到国王！

translation.en: Step back!
translation.zh: 退后！

translation.en: [Sihtric] Go backwards!
translation.zh: 往后退！

translation.en: For Shetland!
translation.zh: 为了设得兰！

translation.en: For Orkney!
translation.zh: 为了奥克尼！

translation.en: Step back!
translation.zh: 退后！

translation.en: -Keep going! -Keep going!
translation.zh: -继续！-继续！

translation.en: [Finan] Back!
translation.zh: 退后！

translation.en: Protect the line! Protect the line!
translation.zh: 保护阵型！

translation.en: Step back!
translation.zh: 退后！

translation.en: [Finan] They'll overrun us if we keep giving ground!
translation.zh: 如果我们继续撤退他们会淹没我们的！

translation.en: What are they doing along the flank?
translation.zh: 他们在侧翼做什么？

translation.en: [Constantin] Send a message that Aethelstan is in front of us!
translation.zh: 传话下去 埃特尔斯坦在我们前面！

translation.en: Step back!
translation.zh: 退后！

translation.en: Step back!
translation.zh: 退后！

translation.en: [Finan] The line's turning, Lord. We're coming around!
translation.zh: 阵型在转换 大人 我们占了上风！

translation.en: Aethelstan is on the Scots' line, Lord.
translation.zh: 埃特尔斯坦在苏格兰人的阵队 大人

translation.en: Swine wedge!
translation.zh: 猪楔策略！

translation.en: Step back!
translation.zh: 退后！

translation.en: [Anlaf] Swine wedge!
translation.zh: 猪楔策略！

translation.en: [Constantin] Anlaf! Stop!
translation.zh: 安拉夫！住手！

translation.en: Push forward!
translation.zh: 向前推进！

translation.en: They're going for Aethelstan!
translation.zh: 他们要抓埃特尔斯坦！

translation.en: Step back!
translation.zh: 退后！

translation.en: Back!
translation.zh: 退后！

translation.en: The wall will not hold!
translation.zh: 盾墙撑不住了！

translation.en: [Uhtred] Aethelstan, hold the line!
translation.zh: 埃特尔斯坦 保持阵型！

translation.en: -[Finan] How much longer, Lord? -[Uhtred] We're almost there.
translation.zh: 还要多久 领主？ 快了

translation.en: They're breaking through Aethelstan's line, Lord!
translation.zh: 他们突围进了埃特尔斯坦的阵队！

translation.en: [Finan] We can't hold!
translation.zh: 我们撑不住了！

translation.en: Step back!
translation.zh: 退后！

translation.en: Push forward!
translation.zh: 向前推进！

translation.en: [Ingilmundr] Lord!
translation.zh: 大人！

translation.en: Lord.
translation.zh: 大人！

translation.en: [Hywel] Protect the king!
translation.zh: 保护国王！

translation.en: [Uhtred] Aethelstan!
translation.zh: 埃特尔斯坦！

translation.en: [Finan] Lord, trees!
translation.zh: 领主 树！

translation.en: We've turned them, Lord! We've turned the line.
translation.zh: 我们成功了 领主！阵型转变了

translation.en: -[Uhtred] Give the signal! -[runner] Yes, Lord.
translation.zh: -发出信号！-是 领主

translation.en: -Something's not right. -[Domnal] We've been turned around!
translation.zh: -不太对劲-我们被包围了！

translation.en: [runner] Make way! Make way!
translation.zh: 让开！

translation.en: Lord Uhtred orders the signal.
translation.zh: 尤特雷德领主要求发出信号

translation.en: Attack!
translation.zh: 进攻！

translation.en: Behind!
translation.zh: 后面！

translation.en: Hunt down their kings!
translation.zh: 击杀他们的国王！

translation.en: It's a trap!
translation.zh: 这是陷阱！

translation.en: [Shetland] My son!
translation.zh: 儿子！

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: Guards!
translation.zh: 护卫！

translation.en: Fall back! Fall back!
translation.zh: 撤退！

translation.en: Scots! Fall back!
translation.zh: 苏格兰人！撤退！

translation.en: Aethelstan!
translation.zh: 埃特尔斯坦！

translation.en: Pyrlig?
translation.zh: 皮耶利格？

translation.en: [Finan] Five kings escaped the field that day,
translation.zh: 那天 有五位国王临阵逃脱

translation.en: but their sons,
translation.zh: 但他们的儿子

translation.en: Orkney, Man, Shetland,
translation.zh: 奥克尼 马恩 设得兰

translation.en: Strathclyde, and Scotland, did not.
translation.zh: 斯特拉思克莱德 还有苏格兰 没逃

translation.en: [Constantin] Each man here has left behind an heir.
translation.zh: 这里的每个人都留下了一个继承人

translation.en: We wait.
translation.zh: 我们等着

translation.en: Then attack those leaving the field and return for our kin.
translation.zh: 剿灭逃兵 再回到我们的亲人身边

translation.en: [Shetland] Do not be any more foolish, Anlaf.
translation.zh: 别再犯蠢了 安拉夫

translation.en: [Anlaf] Shetland?
translation.zh: 设得兰？

translation.en: No more death.
translation.zh: 不要再有牺牲了

translation.en: [Anlaf] Orkney, we need to fight!
translation.zh: 奥克尼 我们必须战斗！

translation.en: What is there to fight for?
translation.zh: 为什么而战？

translation.en: I need a ship to get back to Irland.
translation.zh: 我需要一艘船回爱尔兰

translation.en: You?
translation.zh: 你呢？

translation.en: [Sihtric] Lord!
translation.zh: 领主！

translation.en: [Finan] Uhtred!
translation.zh: 尤特雷德！

translation.en: Uhtred!
translation.zh: 尤特雷德！

translation.en: [Sihtric] Finan! Finan!
translation.zh: 菲南！

translation.en: [Aethelstan] Was any of it real?
translation.zh: （盎格鲁-撒克逊编年史） 你说的那些有一句真话吗？

translation.en: Tell me the truth.
translation.zh: 告诉我真相

translation.en: When you find yourself before God, you will have confessed.
translation.zh: 当你去到上帝面前时 你必将认罪

translation.en: I grew fond of you.
translation.zh: 我越来越喜欢你

translation.en: -But my love for my people prevailed. -I chose you over my people.
translation.zh: -但我对同胞的爱占了上风-在你和我的人民之间 我选择了你

translation.en: Perhaps my gods are stronger than yours.
translation.zh: 也许我的神比你的更强大

translation.en: Then why am I living…
translation.zh: 那为什么我还活着…

translation.en: and you about to die?
translation.zh: 而你就快死了？

translation.en: Only fools try to understand destiny.
translation.zh: 只有傻瓜才会试图理解命运

translation.en: Uhtred.
translation.zh: 尤特雷德

translation.en: Did my son survive? Yes.
translation.zh: -我儿子活下来了吗？-是的

translation.en: [Osbert] And Bebbanburg is ours again.
translation.zh: 而且我们重新拿回了贝班堡

translation.en: -We will rebuild in stone. -[Eadgifu] There is so much future.
translation.zh: -我们会用石头重建-未来可期

translation.en: Stay with us, Uhtred.
translation.zh: 坚持住 尤特雷德

translation.en: -What of the enemy? -[Finan] The victory is ours.
translation.zh: -敌人怎么样了？-我们胜利了

translation.en: Five sons of kings lay dead upon the battlefield.
translation.zh: 五位国王之子战死沙场

translation.en: -Five kings that will never be crowned. -[Finan] "Seven kings must die."
translation.zh: -有五个国王永远不会得到加冕-“七王崩”

translation.en: The prophecy was wrong, Lord.
translation.zh: 预言是错的 领主

translation.en: With Edward of Wessex, it makes six.
translation.zh: 加上韦塞克斯的爱德华 就有六个

translation.en: Am I to be the seventh?
translation.zh: 我会是第七个吗？

translation.en: I have told the chroniclers to write of your victory, Uhtred.
translation.zh: 我已经让史官记录下了你的胜利 尤特雷德

translation.en: I have no wish to be written into your history.
translation.zh: 我无意被写入你的历史

translation.en: I want only to be honored in the feast hall for standing by an oath.
translation.zh: 我只愿在英灵殿堂因信守诺言受到尊敬

translation.en: Uhtred, you did not just stand by me.
translation.zh: 尤特雷德 你不仅是支持我

translation.en: You stood for me.
translation.zh: 你还为我而战

translation.en: You led where I could not.
translation.zh: 你在我不能胜任的时候领军冲锋

translation.en: And you forgave me
translation.zh: 而且你原谅了

translation.en: when I was unforgivable.
translation.zh: 罪无可恕的我

translation.en: You saved the hope of England.
translation.zh: 你拯救了英格兰的希望

translation.en: Now in time, it may yet happen.
translation.zh: 随着时间推移 它可能还会发生

translation.en: I said that…
translation.zh: 我说过

translation.en: if you proved yourself to be the rightful king,
translation.zh: 如果你证明了自己是一名合格的国王

translation.en: I would swear Northumbria to you.
translation.zh: 我就会携诺森布里亚宣誓效忠于你

translation.en: Men have died fighting under the name of the English.
translation.zh: 人们以英国人之名战死

translation.en: To honor them, England should be formed.
translation.zh: 为了向他们致敬 英格兰应该统一

translation.en: But I have one condition.
translation.zh: 不过我有一个条件

translation.en: You must make an oath never to marry.
translation.zh: 你必须发誓永不成婚

translation.en: No heirs.
translation.zh: 不会有继承人

translation.en: So your brother Edmund can take the throne unchallenged.
translation.zh: 这样你弟弟埃德蒙就能不受挑战 顺利继承王位

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: This oath I shall swear.
translation.zh: 我郑重发誓

translation.en: Then we submit to you as our king.
translation.zh: 那我们就奉你为王

translation.en: Which makes you ruler of Wessex, Mercia, East Anglia,
translation.zh: 这样一来 你就成了韦塞克斯麦西亚 东安格利亚

translation.en: and Northumbria.
translation.zh: 还有诺森布里亚的统治者了

translation.en: And I call my lands
translation.zh: 我会将我的领土称为

translation.en: England.
translation.zh: 英格兰

translation.en: Long live the king!
translation.zh: 吾王万岁！

translation.en: [all] Long live the king.
translation.zh: 吾王万岁

translation.en: [Uhtred] Long live the King of England.
translation.zh: 英格兰之王万岁

translation.en: Return to your chamber, Lord.
translation.zh: 回房去吧 领主

translation.en: Do not grieve for me.
translation.zh: 别为我伤怀

translation.en: It was always written that I would fall in battle.
translation.zh: 我命中注定会战死沙场

translation.en: [Finan] You're not gonna die, Lord.
translation.zh: 您不会死的 领主

translation.en: -I would go first, and I'm still alive… -[distant cheering]
translation.zh: 我会先走 我现在还活着 所以…

translation.en: So,
translation.zh: 所以

translation.en: destiny is all.
translation.zh: 天命不可违

translation.en: [Finan] Did seven kings die?
translation.zh: 七王死了吗？

translation.en: The chronicles do not record if my lord Uhtred survived.
translation.zh: 编年史里没有记录下尤特雷德领主是否幸存

translation.en: But those like me, who knew him,
translation.zh: 但像我这样熟悉他的人

translation.en: recognize him as the greatest warrior of our age,
translation.zh: 都认为他是我们时代最伟大的战士

translation.en: and a man who made a kingdom.
translation.zh: 是建国之将
